actionid.description: ID of the action.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

esc_period.description: Duration of an escalation step in seconds. Must be greater than 60 seconds. Accepts seconds, time unit with suffix, or a user macro. If set to 0 or 0s, the default action escalation period will be used.Default: 0s.Property behavior:- supported if eventsource of Action object is set to "event created by a trigger", "internal event", or "event created on service status update"

eventsource.description: Type of events that the action will handle.Refer to the event source property for a list of supported event types.Property behavior:- constant- required for create operations

name.description: Name of the action.Property behavior:- required for create operations

status.description: Whether the action is enabled or disabled.Possible values:0 - (default) enabled;1 - disabled.

pause_symptoms.description: Whether to pause escalation if event is a symptom event.Possible values:0 - Don't pause escalation for symptom problems;1 - (default) Pause escalation for symptom problems.Property behavior:- supported if eventsource is set to "event created by a trigger"

pause_suppressed.description: Whether to pause escalation during maintenance periods or not.Possible values:0 - Don't pause escalation;1 - (default) Pause escalation.Property behavior:- supported if eventsource is set to "event created by a trigger"

notify_if_canceled.description: Whether to notify when escalation is canceled.Possible values:0 - Don't notify when escalation is canceled;1 - (default) Notify when escalation is canceled.Property behavior:- supported if eventsource is set to "event created by a trigger"

operationtype.description: Type of operation.Possible values:0 - send message;1 - global script;12 - notify all involved.Property behavior:- required

esc_step_from.description: Step to start escalation from.Default: 1.Property behavior:- supported if eventsource of Action object is set to "event created by a trigger", "internal event", or "event created on service status update"

esc_step_to.description: Step to end escalation at.Default: 1.Property behavior:- supported if eventsource of Action object is set to "event created by a trigger", "internal event", or "event created on service status update"

evaltype.description: Filter condition evaluation method.Possible values:0 - and/or;1 - and;2 - or;3 - custom expression.Property behavior:- required

opcommand.description: Global script to execute.The global script must have the scriptid property defined.Property behavior:- required if operationtype is set to "global script"

opcommand_grp.description: Host groups to run global scripts on.The host groups must have the groupid property defined.Property behavior:- required if eventsource of Action object is set to "event created by a trigger", and operationtype is set to "global script", and opcommand_hst is not set

opcommand_hst.description: Host to run global scripts on.The hosts must have the hostid property defined.Property behavior:- required if eventsource of Action object is set to "event created by a trigger", and operationtype is set to "global script", and opcommand_grp is not set

opconditions.description: Operation conditions used for trigger actions.The operation condition object is described in detail below.

opgroup.description: Host groups to add hosts to.The host groups must have the groupid property defined.Property behavior:- required if operationtype is set to "add to host group" or "remove from host group"

opmessage.description: Object containing the data about the message sent by the update operation.The operation message object is described in detail above.

opmessage_grp.description: User groups to send messages to.The user groups must have the usrgrpid property defined.Property behavior:- required if operationtype is set to "send message" and opmessage_usr is not set

opmessage_usr.description: Users to send messages to.The users must have the userid property defined.Property behavior:- required if operationtype is set to "send message" and opmessage_grp is not set

optemplate.description: Templates to link the hosts to.The templates must have the templateid property defined.Property behavior:- required if operationtype is set to "link to template" or "unlink from template"

opinventory.description: Inventory mode set host to.The inventory must have the inventory_mode property defined.Property behavior:- required if operationtype is set to "set host inventory mode"

default_msg.description: Whether to use the default action message text and subject.Possible values:0 - use the data from the operation;1 - (default) use the data from the media type.

mediatypeid.description: ID of the media type that will be used to send the message.Property behavior:- supported if operationtype of Action operation object, Action recovery operation object, or Action update operation object is set to "send message", or if operationtype of Action update operation object is set to "notify all involved"

message.description: Operation message text.Property behavior:- supported if default_msg is set to "use the data from the operation"

subject.description: Operation message subject.Property behavior:- supported if default_msg is set to "use the data from the operation"

conditiontype.description: Type of condition.Possible values if eventsource of Action object is set to "event created by a trigger":0 - host group;1 - host;2 - trigger;3 - trigger name;4 - trigger severity;6 - time period;13 - host template;16 - problem is suppressed;25 - event tag;26 - event tag value.Possible values if eventsource of Action object is set to "event created by a discovery rule":7 - host IP;8 - discovered service type;9 - discovered service port;10 - discovery status;11 - uptime or downtime duration;12 - received value;18 - discovery rule;19 - discovery check;20 - proxy;21 - discovery object.Possible values if eventsource of Action object is set to "event created by active agent autoregistration":20 - proxy;22 - host name;24 - host metadata.Possible values if eventsource of Action object is set to "internal event":0 - host group;1 - host;13 - host template;23 - event type;25 - event tag;26 - event tag value.Possible values if eventsource of Action object is set to "event created on service status update":25 - event tag;26 - event tag value;27 - service;28 - service name.Property behavior:- required

value.description: Value to compare with.Property behavior:- required

operator.description: Condition operator.Possible values:0 - (default) equals;1 - does not equal;2 - contains;3 - does not contain;4 - in;5 - is greater than or equals;6 - is less than or equals;7 - not in;8 - matches;9 - does not match;10 - Yes;11 - No.

conditions.description: Set of filter conditions to use for filtering results.Property behavior:- required

eval_formula.description: Generated expression that will be used for evaluating filter conditions. The expression contains IDs that reference specific filter conditions by its formulaid. The value of eval_formula is equal to the value of formula for filters with a custom expression.Property behavior:- read-only

formula.description: User-defined expression to be used for evaluating conditions of filters with a custom expression. The expression must contain IDs that reference specific filter conditions by its formulaid. The IDs used in the expression must exactly match the ones defined in the filter conditions: no condition can remain unused or omitted.Property behavior:- required if evaltype is set to "custom expression"

value2.description: Secondary value to compare with.Property behavior:- required if eventsource of Action object is set to "event created by a trigger", conditiontype is set to any possible value for trigger actions, and the type of condition (see below) is "26"- required if eventsource of Action object is set to "internal event", conditiontype is set to any possible value for internal actions, and the type of condition (see below) is "26"- required if eventsource of Action object is set to "event created on service status update", conditiontype is set to any possible value for service actions, and the type of condition (see below) is "26"

formulaid.description: Arbitrary unique ID that is used to reference the condition from a custom expression. Can only contain capital-case letters. The ID must be defined by the user when modifying filter conditions, but will be generated anew when requesting them afterward.

4.description: equals,does not equal,is greater than or equals,is less than or equals

11.description: is greater than or equals,is less than or equals

12.description: equals,does not equal,is greater than or equals,is less than or equals,contains,does not contain

actionid.description: ID of the action that generated the alert.

alerttype.description: Alert type.Possible values:0 - message;1 - remote command.

clock.description: Time when the alert was generated.

error.description: Error text if there are problems sending a message or running a command.

esc_step.description: Action escalation step during which the alert was generated.

eventid.description: ID of the event that triggered the action.

mediatypeid.description: ID of the media type that was used to send the message.

message.description: Message text.Property behavior:- supported if alerttype is set to "message"

retries.description: Number of times Zabbix tried to send the message.

sendto.description: Address, user name or other identifier of the recipient.Property behavior:- supported if alerttype is set to "message"

status.description: Status indicating whether the action operation has been executed successfully.Possible values if alerttype is set to "message":0 - message not sent;1 - message sent;2 - failed after a number of retries;3 - new alert is not yet processed by alert manager.Possible values if alerttype is set to "remote command":0 - command not run;1 - command run;2 - tried to run the command on Zabbix agent, but it was unavailable.

subject.description: Message subject.Property behavior:- supported if alerttype is set to "message"

userid.description: ID of the user that the message was sent to.

p_eventid.description: ID of problem event, which generated the alert.

acknowledgeid.description: ID of acknowledgment, which generated the alert.

auditid.description: ID of audit log entry. Generated using CUID algorithm.

ip.description: Audit log entry author IP address.

action.description: Audit log entry action.Possible values:0 - Add;1 - Update;2 - Delete;4 - Logout;7 - Execute;8 - Login;9 - Failed login;10 - History clear;11 - Config refresh.

resourcetype.description: Audit log entry resource type.Possible values:0 - User;3 - Media type;4 - Host;5 - Action;6 - Graph;11 - User group;13 - Trigger;14 - Host group;15 - Item;16 - Image;17 - Value map;18 - Service;19 - Map;22 - Web scenario;23 - Discovery rule;25 - Script;26 - Proxy;27 - Maintenance;28 - Regular expression;29 - Macro;30 - Template;31 - Trigger prototype;32 - Icon mapping;33 - Dashboard;34 - Event correlation;35 - Graph prototype;36 - Item prototype;37 - Host prototype;38 - Autoregistration;39 - Module;40 - Settings;41 - Housekeeping;42 - Authentication;43 - Template dashboard;44 - User role;45 - Auth token;46 - Scheduled report;47 - High availability node;48 - SLA;49 - LDAP user directory.50 - Template group.

resourcename.description: Audit log entry resource human readable name.

recordsetid.description: Audit log entry recordset ID. The audit log records created during the same operation will have the same recordset ID. Generated using CUID algorithm.

details.description: Audit log entry details. The details are stored as a JSON object, where each property name is a path to the property or nested object in which the change occurred, and where each value contains the data (in array format) about the change in this property or nested object.Possible value formats:["add"] - Nested object has been added;["add", "<value>"] - The property of the added object equals <value>;["update"] - Nested object has been updated;["update", "<new value>", "<old value>"] - The property of the updated object was changed from <old value> to <new value>;["delete"] - Nested object has been deleted.

http_login_form.description: Default login form.Possible values:0 - (default) Zabbix login form;1 - HTTP login form.

http_case_sensitive.description: HTTP case sensitive login.Possible values:0 - Off;1 - (default) On.

ldap_case_sensitive.description: LDAP case sensitive login.Possible values:0 - Off;1 - (default) On.

ldap_userdirectoryid.description: Default user directory for LDAP authentication. Used for user groups with gui_access set to LDAP or System default.Property behavior:- required if ldap_auth_enabled is set to "Enabled"

saml_case_sensitive.description: SAML case sensitive login.Possible values:0 - Off;1 - (default) On.

passwd_min_length.description: Password minimal length requirement.Valid values range from 1 to 70.Default: 8.

passwd_check_rules.description: Password checking rules.This is a bitmask field, any combination of possible bitmap values is acceptable.Possible bitmap values:0 - check password length;1 - check if password uses uppercase and lowercase Latin letters;2 - check if password uses digits;4 - check if password uses special characters;8 - (default) check if password is not in the list of commonly used passwords, does not contain derivations of word "Zabbix" or user's name, last name or username.

ldap_jit_status.description: Status of LDAP provisioning.Possible values:0 - Disabled for configured LDAP IdPs;1 - Enabled for configured LDAP IdPs.

saml_jit_status.description: Status of SAML provisioning.Possible values:0 - Disabled for configured SAML IdPs;1 - Enabled for configured SAML IdPs.

jit_provision_interval.description: Time interval between JIT provision requests for logged-in user.Accepts seconds and time unit with suffix with month and year support (3600s,60m,1h,1d,1M,1y). Minimum value: 1h.Default: 1h.Available only for LDAP provisioning.

disabled_usrgrpid.description: User group ID to assign the deprovisioned user to.The user group must be disabled and cannot be enabled or deleted when configured.Property behavior:- required if ldap_jit_status is set to "Enabled for configured LDAP IdPs", or saml_jit_status is set to "Enabled for configured SAML IdPs"

tls_accept.description: Type of allowed incoming connections for autoregistration.Possible values:1 - allow insecure connections;2 - allow TLS with PSK;3 - allow both insecure and TLS with PSK connections.

tls_psk_identity.description: PSK identity string.Do not put sensitive information in the PSK identity, it is transmitted unencrypted over the network to inform a receiver which PSK to use.Property behavior:- write-only

tls_psk.description: PSK value string (an even number of hexadecimal characters).Property behavior:- write-only

correlationid.description: ID of the correlation.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

name.description: Name of the correlation.Property behavior:- required for create operations

status.description: Whether the correlation is enabled or disabled.Possible values:0 - (default) enabled;1 - disabled.

type.description: Type of condition.Possible values:0 - old event tag;1 - new event tag;2 - new event host group;3 - event tag pair;4 - old event tag value;5 - new event tag value.Property behavior:- required

evaltype.description: Filter condition evaluation method.Possible values:0 - and/or;1 - and;2 - or;3 - custom expression.Property behavior:- required

conditions.description: Set of filter conditions to use for filtering results.Property behavior:- required

eval_formula.description: Generated expression that will be used for evaluating filter conditions. The expression contains IDs that reference specific filter conditions by its formulaid. The value of eval_formula is equal to the value of formula for filters with a custom expression.Property behavior:- read-only

formula.description: User-defined expression to be used for evaluating conditions of filters with a custom expression. The expression must contain IDs that reference specific filter conditions by its formulaid. The IDs used in the expression must exactly match the ones defined in the filter conditions: no condition can remain unused or omitted.Property behavior:- required if evaltype is set to "custom expression"

tag.description: Event tag (old or new).Property behavior:- required if type is set to "old event tag", "new event tag", "old event tag value", or "new event tag value"

groupid.description: Host group ID.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "new event host group"

oldtag.description: Old event tag.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "event tag pair"

newtag.description: Old event tag.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "event tag pair"

value.description: Event tag (old or new) value.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "old event tag value" or "new event tag value"

formulaid.description: Arbitrary unique ID that is used to reference the condition from a custom expression. Can only contain capital-case letters. The ID must be defined by the user when modifying filter conditions, but will be generated anew when requesting them afterward.

operator.description: Condition operator.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "new event host group", "old event tag value", or "new event tag value"

dashboardid.description: ID of the dashboard.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

name.description: Widget field name.Possible values: see Dashboard widget fields.Property behavior:- required

private.description: Type of dashboard sharing.Possible values:0 - public dashboard;1 - (default) private dashboard.

display_period.description: Dashboard page display period (in seconds).Possible values: 0, 10, 30, 60, 120, 600, 1800, 3600.Default: 0 (will use the default page display period).

auto_start.description: Auto start slideshow.Possible values:0 - do not auto start slideshow;1 - (default) auto start slideshow.

dashboard_pageid.description: ID of the dashboard page.Property behavior:- read-only

widgets.description: Array of the dashboard widget objects.

widgetid.description: ID of the dashboard widget.Property behavior:- read-only

type.description: Type of the widget field.Possible values:0 - Integer;1 - String;2 - Host group;3 - Host;4 - Item;5 - Item prototype;6 - Graph;7 - Graph prototype;8 - Map;9 - Service;10 - SLA;11 - User;12 - Action;13 - Media type.Property behavior:- required

x.description: A horizontal position from the left side of the dashboard.Valid values range from 0 to 23.

y.description: A vertical position from the top of the dashboard.Valid values range from 0 to 62.

width.description: The widget width.Valid values range from 1 to 24.

height.description: The widget height.Valid values range from 2 to 32.

view_mode.description: The widget view mode.Possible values:0 - (default) default widget view;1 - with hidden header;

fields.description: Array of the dashboard widget field objects.

value.description: Widget field value depending on the type.Possible values: see Dashboard widget fields.Property behavior:- required

permission.description: Type of permission level.Possible values:2 - read only;3 - read-write.Property behavior:- required

itemid.description: ID of the LLD rule.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

delay.description: Override the update interval of the item prototype. Accepts seconds or a time unit with suffix (30s,1m,2h,1d) as well as flexible and scheduling intervals and user macros or LLD macros. Multiple intervals are separated by a semicolon.Property behavior:- required

hostid.description: ID of the host that the LLD rule belongs to.Property behavior:- constant- required for create operations

interfaceid.description: ID of the LLD rule's host interface.Property behavior:- required if LLD rule belongs to host and type is set to "Zabbix agent", "IPMI agent", "JMX agent", or "SNMP agent"- supported if LLD rule belongs to host and type is set to "Simple check", "External check", "SSH agent", "TELNET agent", or "HTTP agent"

key_.description: LLD rule key.Property behavior:- required for create operations- read-only for inherited objects

name.description: Unique override name.Property behavior:- required

type.description: The preprocessing option type.Possible values:5 - Regular expression matching;11 - XML XPath;12 - JSONPath;15 - Does not match regular expression;16 - Check for error in JSON;17 - Check for error in XML;20 - Discard unchanged with heartbeat;23 - Prometheus to JSON;24 - CSV to JSON;25 - Replace;27 - XML to JSON;28 - SNMP walk value;29 - SNMP walk to JSON.Property behavior:- required

url.description: URL string.Supports user macros, {HOST.IP}, {HOST.CONN}, {HOST.DNS}, {HOST.HOST}, {HOST.NAME}, {ITEM.ID}, {ITEM.KEY}.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

allow_traps.description: Allow to populate value similarly to the trapper item.Possible values:0 - (default) Do not allow to accept incoming data;1 - Allow to accept incoming data.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"

authtype.description: Authentication method.Possible values if type is set to "SSH agent":0 - (default) password;1 - public key.Possible values if type is set to "HTTP agent":0 - (default) none;1 - basic;2 - NTLM.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "SSH agent" or "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects (if type is set to "HTTP agent")

error.description: Error text if there are problems updating the LLD rule.Property behavior:- read-only

follow_redirects.description: Follow response redirects while pooling data.Possible values:0 - Do not follow redirects;1 - (default) Follow redirects.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

headers.description: Object with HTTP(S) request headers, where header name is used as key and header value as value.Example: { "User-Agent": "Zabbix" }Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

http_proxy.description: HTTP(S) proxy connection string.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

ipmi_sensor.description: IPMI sensor.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "IPMI agent" and key_ is not set to "ipmi.get"- supported if type is set to "IPMI agent"- read-only for inherited objects

jmx_endpoint.description: JMX agent custom connection string.Default: service:jmx:rmi:///jndi/rmi://{HOST.CONN}:{HOST.PORT}/jmxrmiProperty behavior:- supported if type is set to "JMX agent"

lifetime.description: Time period after which items that are no longer discovered will be deleted. Accepts seconds, time unit with suffix, or a user macro.Default: 30d.

master_itemid.description: Master item ID.Recursion up to 3 dependent items and maximum count of dependent items equal to 999 are allowed.Discovery rule cannot be master item for another discovery rule.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "Dependent item"- read-only for inherited objects

output_format.description: Should the response be converted to JSON.Possible values:0 - (default) Store raw;1 - Convert to JSON.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

params.description: Additional parameters used by preprocessing option. Multiple parameters are separated by the newline ( ) character.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "Regular expression matching" (5), "XML XPath" (11), "JSONPath" (12), "Does not match regular expression" (15), "Check for error in JSON" (16), "Check for error in XML" (17), "Discard unchanged with heartbeat" (20), "Prometheus to JSON" (23), "CSV to JSON" (24), "Replace" (25), "SNMP walk value" (28), or "SNMP walk to JSON" (29)

parameters.description: Additional parameters if type is set to "Script".Array of objects with name and value properties, where name must be unique.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "Script"- read-only for inherited objects

password.description: Password for authentication.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "JMX agent" and username is set- supported if type is set to "Simple check", "Database monitor", "SSH agent", "TELNET agent", or "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects (if type is set to "HTTP agent")

post_type.description: Type of post data body stored in posts property.Possible values:0 - (default) Raw data;2 - JSON data;3 - XML data.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

posts.description: HTTP(S) request body data.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "HTTP agent" and post_type is set to "JSON data" or "XML data"- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent" and post_type is set to "Raw data"- read-only for inherited objects

privatekey.description: Name of the private key file.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "SSH agent" and authtype is set to "public key"

publickey.description: Name of the public key file.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "SSH agent" and authtype is set to "public key"

query_fields.description: Query parameters.Array of objects with key:value pairs, where value can be an empty string.

request_method.description: Type of request method.Possible values:0 - (default) GET;1 - POST;2 - PUT;3 - HEAD.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

retrieve_mode.description: What part of response should be stored.Possible values if request_method is set to "GET", "POST", or "PUT":0 - (default) Body;1 - Headers;2 - Both body and headers will be stored.Possible values if request_method is set to "HEAD":1 - Headers.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

snmp_oid.description: SNMP OID.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "SNMP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

ssl_cert_file.description: Public SSL Key file path.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

ssl_key_file.description: Private SSL Key file path.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

ssl_key_password.description: Password for SSL Key file.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

state.description: State of the LLD rule.Possible values:0 - (default) normal;1 - not supported.Property behavior:- read-only

status.description: Override the status for selected object.Possible values:0 - Create enabled;1 - Create disabled.Property behavior:- required

status_codes.description: Ranges of required HTTP status codes, separated by commas. Also supports user macros as part of comma separated list.Example: 200,200-{$M},{$M},200-400Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

templateid.description: Override the template of host prototype linked templates.Property behavior:- required

timeout.description: Item data polling request timeout. Supports user macros.Default: 3s.Maximum value: 60s.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent" or "Script"- read-only for inherited objects

trapper_hosts.description: Allowed hosts.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "Zabbix trapper", or if type is set to "HTTP agent" and allow_traps is set to "Allow to accept incoming data"

username.description: Username for authentication.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "SSH agent", "TELNET agent", or if type is set to "JMX agent" and password is set- supported if type is set to "Simple check", "Database monitor", or "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects (if type is set to "HTTP agent")

uuid.description: Universal unique identifier, used for linking imported LLD rules to already existing ones. Auto-generated, if not given.Property behavior:- supported if the LLD rule belongs to a template

verify_host.description: Validate host name in URL is in Common Name field or a Subject Alternate Name field of host certificate.Possible values:0 - (default) Do not validate;1 - Validate.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

verify_peer.description: Validate is host certificate authentic.Possible values:0 - (default) Do not validate;1 - Validate.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

conditions.description: Set of override filter conditions to use for matching the discovered objects.Property behavior:- required

evaltype.description: Override filter condition evaluation method.Possible values:0 - and/or;1 - and;2 - or;3 - custom expression.Property behavior:- required

eval_formula.description: Generated expression that will be used for evaluating override filter conditions. The expression contains IDs that reference specific override filter conditions by its formulaid. The value of eval_formula is equal to the value of formula for filters with a custom expression.Property behavior:- read-only

formula.description: User-defined expression to be used for evaluating conditions of override filters with a custom expression. The expression must contain IDs that reference specific override filter conditions by its formulaid. The IDs used in the expression must exactly match the ones defined in the override filter conditions: no condition can remain unused or omitted.Property behavior:- required if evaltype is set to "custom expression"

macro.description: LLD macro to perform the check on.Property behavior:- required

formulaid.description: Arbitrary unique ID that is used to reference the condition from a custom expression. Can only contain capital-case letters. The ID must be defined by the user when modifying filter conditions, but will be generated anew when requesting them afterward.

operator.description: Override condition operator.Possible values:0 - (default) equals;1 - does not equal;2 - contains;3 - does not contain;8 - matches;9 - does not match.

path.description: Selector for value which will be assigned to corresponding macro.Property behavior:- required

error_handler.description: Action type used in case of preprocessing step failure.Possible values:0 - Error message is set by Zabbix server;1 - Discard value;2 - Set custom value;3 - Set custom error message.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "Regular expression matching" (5), "XML XPath" (11), "JSONPath" (12), "Does not match regular expression" (15), "Check for error in JSON" (16), "Check for error in XML" (17), "Prometheus to JSON" (23), "CSV to JSON" (24), "XML to JSON" (27), "SNMP walk value" (28), or "SNMP walk to JSON" (29)

error_handler_params.description: Error handler parameters.Property behavior:- required if error_handler is set to "Set custom value" or "Set custom error message"

step.description: Unique order number of the override.Property behavior:- required

stop.description: Stop processing next overrides if matches.Possible values:0 - (default) don't stop processing overrides;1 - stop processing overrides if filter matches.

operationobject.description: Type of discovered object to perform the action.Possible values:0 - Item prototype;1 - Trigger prototype;2 - Graph prototype;3 - Host prototype.Property behavior:- required

opstatus.description: Override operation status object for item, trigger and host prototype objects.

opdiscover.description: Override operation discover status object (all object types).

opperiod.description: Override operation period (update interval) object for item prototype object.

ophistory.description: Override operation history object for item prototype object.

optrends.description: Override operation trends object for item prototype object.

opseverity.description: Override operation severity object for trigger prototype object.

optag.description: Override operation tag object for trigger and host prototype objects.

optemplate.description: Override operation template object for host prototype object.

opinventory.description: Override operation inventory object for host prototype object.

discover.description: Override the discover status for selected object.Possible values:0 - Yes, continue discovering the objects;1 - No, new objects will not be discovered and existing ones will be marked as lost.Property behavior:- required

history.description: Override the history of item prototype which is a time unit of how long the history data should be stored. Also accepts user macro and LLD macro.Property behavior:- required

trends.description: Override the trends of item prototype which is a time unit of how long the trends data should be stored. Also accepts user macro and LLD macro.Property behavior:- required

severity.description: Override the severity of trigger prototype.Possible values:0 - (default) not classified;1 - information;2 - warning;3 - average;4 - high;5 - disaster.Property behavior:- required

inventory_mode.description: Override the host prototype inventory mode.Possible values:-1 - disabled;0 - (default) manual;1 - automatic.Property behavior:- required

source.description: Type of the event.Possible values:0 - event created by a trigger;1 - event created by a discovery rule;2 - event created by active agent autoregistration;3 - internal event;4 - event created on service status update.

object.description: Type of object that is related to the event.Possible values if source is set to "event created by a trigger":0 - trigger.Possible values if source is set to "event created by a discovery rule":1 - discovered host;2 - discovered service.Possible values if source is set to "event created by active agent autoregistration":3 - auto-registered host.Possible values if source is set to "internal event":0 - trigger;4 - item;5 - LLD rule.Possible values if source is set to "event created on service status update":6 - service.

acknowledged.description: Whether the event has been acknowledged.

clock.description: Time when the event was created.

ns.description: Nanoseconds when the event was created.

name.description: Media type defined URL name.

severity.description: Event current severity.Possible values:0 - not classified;1 - information;2 - warning;3 - average;4 - high;5 - disaster.

c_eventid.description: ID of the event that was used to override (close) current event under global correlation rule. See correlationid to identify exact correlation rule.This parameter is only defined when the event is closed by global correlation rule.

correlationid.description: ID of the correlation rule that generated closing of the problem.This parameter is only defined when the event is closed by global correlation rule.

userid.description: User ID if the event was manually closed.

suppressed.description: Whether the event is suppressed.Possible values:0 - event is in normal state;1 - event is suppressed.

graphid.description: ID of the graph.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

height.description: Height of the graph in pixels.Property behavior:- required for create operations

name.description: Name of the graph.Property behavior:- required for create operations

width.description: Width of the graph in pixels.Property behavior:- required for create operations

flags.description: Origin of the graph.Possible values:0 - (default) a plain graph;4 - a discovered graph.Property behavior:- read-only

graphtype.description: Graph's layout type.Possible values:0 - (default) normal;1 - stacked;2 - pie;3 - exploded.

show_3d.description: Whether to show pie and exploded graphs in 3D.Possible values:0 - (default) show in 2D;1 - show in 3D.

show_legend.description: Whether to show the legend on the graph.Possible values:0 - hide;1 - (default) show.

show_work_period.description: Whether to show the working time on the graph.Possible values:0 - hide;1 - (default) show.

show_triggers.description: Whether to show the trigger line on the graph.Possible values:0 - hide;1 - (default) show.

templateid.description: ID of the parent template graph.Property behavior:- read-only

yaxismax.description: The fixed maximum value for the Y axis.Default: 100.

yaxismin.description: The fixed minimum value for the Y axis.Default: 0.

ymax_itemid.description: ID of the item that is used as the maximum value for the Y axis.If a user has no access to the specified item, the graph is rendered as if ymax_type is set to "calculated".

ymax_type.description: Maximum value calculation method for the Y axis.Possible values:0 - (default) calculated;1 - fixed;2 - item.

ymin_itemid.description: ID of the item that is used as the minimum value for the Y axis.If a user has no access to the specified item, the graph is rendered as if ymin_type is set to "calculated".

ymin_type.description: Minimum value calculation method for the Y axis.Possible values:0 - (default) calculated;1 - fixed;2 - item.

uuid.description: Universal unique identifier, used for linking imported graphs to already existing ones. Auto-generated, if not given.Property behavior:- supported if the graph belongs to a template

gitemid.description: ID of the graph item.Property behavior:- read-only

color.description: Graph item's draw color as a hexadecimal color code.Property behavior:- required for create operations

itemid.description: ID of the item.Property behavior:- required for create operations

calc_fnc.description: Value of the item that will be displayed.Possible values:1 - minimum value;2 - (default) average value;4 - maximum value;7 - all values;9 - last value, used only by pie and exploded graphs.

drawtype.description: Draw style of the graph item.Possible values:0 - (default) line;1 - filled region;2 - bold line;3 - dot;4 - dashed line;5 - gradient line.

graphid.description: ID of the graph that the graph item belongs to.

sortorder.description: Position of the item in the graph.Default: starts with "0" and increases by one with each entry.

type.description: Type of graph item.Possible values:0 - (default) simple;2 - graph sum, used only by pie and exploded graphs.

yaxisside.description: Side of the graph where the graph item's Y scale will be drawn.Possible values:0 - (default) left side;1 - right side.

graphid.description: ID of the graph prototype.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

height.description: Height of the graph prototype in pixels.Property behavior:- required for create operations

name.description: Name of the graph prototype.Property behavior:- required for create operations

width.description: Width of the graph prototype in pixels.Property behavior:- required for create operations

graphtype.description: Graph prototypes's layout type.Possible values:0 - (default) normal;1 - stacked;2 - pie;3 - exploded.

show_3d.description: Whether to show discovered pie and exploded graphs in 3D.Possible values:0 - (default) show in 2D;1 - show in 3D.

show_legend.description: Whether to show the legend on the discovered graph.Possible values:0 - hide;1 - (default) show.

show_work_period.description: Whether to show the working time on the discovered graph.Possible values:0 - hide;1 - (default) show.

templateid.description: ID of the parent template graph prototype.Property behavior:- read-only

yaxismax.description: The fixed maximum value for the Y axis.

yaxismin.description: The fixed minimum value for the Y axis.

ymax_itemid.description: ID of the item that is used as the maximum value for the Y axis.If a user has no access to the specified item, the graph is rendered as if ymax_type is set to "calculated".

ymax_type.description: Maximum value calculation method for the Y axis.Possible values:0 - (default) calculated;1 - fixed;2 - item.

ymin_itemid.description: ID of the item that is used as the minimum value for the Y axis.If a user has no access to the specified item, the graph is rendered as if ymin_type is set to "calculated".

ymin_type.description: Minimum value calculation method for the Y axis.Possible values:0 - (default) calculated;1 - fixed;2 - item.

discover.description: Graph prototype discovery status.Possible values:0 - (default) new graphs will be discovered;1 - new graphs will not be discovered and existing graphs will be marked as lost.

uuid.description: Universal unique identifier, used for linking imported graph prototypes to already existing ones. Auto-generated, if not given.Property behavior:- supported if the graph prototype belongs to a template

clock.description: Time when that value was received.

ns.description: Nanoseconds when the value was received.

hostid.description: ID of the host.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

host.description: Technical name of the host.Property behavior:- required for create operations

flags.description: Origin of the host.Possible values:0 - a plain host;4 - a discovered host.Property behavior:- read-only

inventory_mode.description: Host inventory population mode.Possible values:-1 - (default) disabled;0 - manual;1 - automatic.

ipmi_authtype.description: IPMI authentication algorithm.Possible values:-1 - (default) default;0 - none;1 - MD2;2 - MD54 - straight;5 - OEM;6 - RMCP+.

ipmi_privilege.description: IPMI privilege level.Possible values:1 - callback;2 - (default) user;3 - operator;4 - admin;5 - OEM.

maintenance_from.description: Starting time of the effective maintenance.Property behavior:- read-only

maintenance_status.description: Effective maintenance status.Possible values:0 - (default) no maintenance;1 - maintenance in effect.Property behavior:- read-only

maintenance_type.description: Effective maintenance type.Possible values:0 - (default) maintenance with data collection;1 - maintenance without data collection.Property behavior:- read-only

maintenanceid.description: ID of the maintenance that is currently in effect on the host.Property behavior:- read-only

name.description: Visible name of the host.Default: host property value.

proxy_hostid.description: ID of the proxy that is used to monitor the host.

status.description: Status and function of the host.Possible values:0 - (default) monitored host;1 - unmonitored host.

tls_connect.description: Connections to host.Possible values:1 - (default) No encryption;2 - PSK;4 - certificate.

tls_accept.description: Connections from host.This is a bitmask field, any combination of possible bitmap values is acceptable.Possible bitmap values:1 - (default) No encryption;2 - PSK;4 - certificate.

tls_psk_identity.description: PSK identity.Do not put sensitive information in the PSK identity, it is transmitted unencrypted over the network to inform a receiver which PSK to use.Property behavior:- write-only- required if tls_connect is set to "PSK", or tls_accept contains the "PSK" bit

tls_psk.description: The preshared key, at least 32 hex digits.Property behavior:- write-only- required if tls_connect is set to "PSK", or tls_accept contains the "PSK" bit

active_available.description: Host active interface availability status.Possible values:0 - interface status is unknown;1 - interface is available;2 - interface is not available.Property behavior:- read-only

automatic.description: Type of host tag.Possible values:0 - (default) manual (tag created by user);1 - automatic (tag created by low-level discovery)

groupid.description: ID of the host group.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

name.description: Name of the host group.Property behavior:- required for create operations

flags.description: Origin of the host group.Possible values:0 - a plain host group;4 - a discovered host group.Property behavior:- read-only

uuid.description: Universal unique identifier, used for linking imported host groups to already existing ones. Auto-generated, if not given.

interfaceid.description: ID of the interface.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

available.description: Availability of host interface.Possible values:0 - (default) unknown;1 - available;2 - unavailable.Property behavior:- read-only

hostid.description: ID of the host that the interface belongs to.Property behavior:- constant- required for create operations

type.description: Interface type.Possible values:1 - Agent;2 - SNMP;3 - IPMI;4 - JMX.Property behavior:- required for create operations

ip.description: IP address used by the interface.Can be empty if the connection is made via DNS.Property behavior:- required for create operations

dns.description: DNS name used by the interface.Can be empty if the connection is made via IP.Property behavior:- required for create operations

port.description: Port number used by the interface.Can contain user macros.Property behavior:- required for create operations

useip.description: Whether the connection should be made via IP.Possible values:0 - connect using host DNS name;1 - connect using host IP address.Property behavior:- required for create operations

main.description: Whether the interface is used as default on the host. Only one interface of some type can be set as default on a host.Possible values:0 - not default;1 - default.Property behavior:- required for create operations

details.description: Additional details object for interface.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "SNMP"

disable_until.description: The next polling time of an unavailable host interface.Property behavior:- read-only

error.description: Error text if host interface is unavailable.Property behavior:- read-only

errors_from.description: Time when host interface became unavailable.Property behavior:- read-only

version.description: SNMP interface version.Possible values:1 - SNMPv1;2 - SNMPv2c;3 - SNMPv3.Property behavior:- required

bulk.description: Whether to use bulk SNMP requests.Possible values:0 - don't use bulk requests;1 - (default) - use bulk requests.

community.description: SNMP community. Used only by SNMPv1 and SNMPv2 interfaces.Property behavior:- required if version is set to "SNMPv1" or "SNMPv2c"

securityname.description: SNMPv3 security name. Used only by SNMPv3 interfaces.

securitylevel.description: SNMPv3 security level. Used only by SNMPv3 interfaces.Possible values:0 - (default) - noAuthNoPriv;1 - authNoPriv;2 - authPriv.

authpassphrase.description: SNMPv3 authentication passphrase. Used only by SNMPv3 interfaces.

privpassphrase.description: SNMPv3 privacy passphrase. Used only by SNMPv3 interfaces.

authprotocol.description: SNMPv3 authentication protocol. Used only by SNMPv3 interfaces.Possible values:0 - (default) - MD5;1 - SHA1;2 - SHA224;3 - SHA256;4 - SHA384;5 - SHA512.

privprotocol.description: SNMPv3 privacy protocol. Used only by SNMPv3 interfaces.Possible values:0 - (default) - DES;1 - AES128;2 - AES192;3 - AES256;4 - AES192C;5 - AES256C.

contextname.description: SNMPv3 context name. Used only by SNMPv3 interfaces.

hostid.description: ID of the host prototype.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

host.description: Technical name of the host prototype.Property behavior:- required for create operations- read-only for inherited objects

name.description: Name of the group prototype.Property behavior:- required

status.description: Status of the host prototype.Possible values:0 - (default) monitored host;1 - unmonitored host.

inventory_mode.description: Host inventory population mode.Possible values:-1 - (default) disabled;0 - manual;1 - automatic.

templateid.description: ID of the parent template host prototype.Property behavior:- read-only

discover.description: Host prototype discovery status.Possible values:0 - (default) new hosts will be discovered;1 - new hosts will not be discovered and existing hosts will be marked as lost.

custom_interfaces.description: Source of custom interfaces for hosts created by the host prototype.Possible values:0 - (default) inherit interfaces from parent host;1 - use host prototypes custom interfaces.Property behavior:- read-only for inherited objects

uuid.description: Universal unique identifier, used for linking imported host prototypes to already existing ones. Auto-generated, if not given.Property behavior:- supported if the host prototype belongs to a template

groupid.description: ID of the host group.Property behavior:- required

tag.description: Host prototype tag name.Property behavior:- required

type.description: Interface type.Possible values:1 - Agent;2 - SNMP;3 - IPMI;4 - JMX.Property behavior:- required

useip.description: Whether the connection should be made via IP.Possible values:0 - connect using host DNS name;1 - connect using host IP address.Property behavior:- required

ip.description: IP address used by the interface.Can contain macros.Property behavior:- required if useip is set to "connect using host IP address"

dns.description: DNS name used by the interface.Can contain macros.Property behavior:- required if useip is set to "connect using host DNS name"

port.description: Port number used by the interface.Can contain user and LLD macros.Property behavior:- required

main.description: Whether the interface is used as default on the host.Only one interface of some type can be set as default on a host.Possible values:0 - not default;1 - default.Property behavior:- required

details.description: Additional object for interface.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "SNMP"

version.description: SNMP interface version.Possible values:1 - SNMPv1;2 - SNMPv2c;3 - SNMPv3.Property behavior:- required

bulk.description: Whether to use bulk SNMP requests.Possible values:0 - don't use bulk requests;1 - (default) - use bulk requests.

community.description: SNMP community.Property behavior:- required if version is set to "SNMPv1" or "SNMPv2c"

securityname.description: SNMPv3 security name.Property behavior:- supported if version is set to "SNMPv3"

securitylevel.description: SNMPv3 security level.Possible values:0 - (default) - noAuthNoPriv;1 - authNoPriv;2 - authPriv.Property behavior:- supported if version is set to "SNMPv3"

authpassphrase.description: SNMPv3 authentication passphrase.Property behavior:- supported if version is set to "SNMPv3" and securitylevel is set to "authNoPriv" or "authPriv"

privpassphrase.description: SNMPv3 privacy passphrase.Property behavior:- supported if version is set to "SNMPv3" and securitylevel is set to "authPriv"

authprotocol.description: SNMPv3 authentication protocol.Possible values:0 - (default) - MD5;1 - SHA1;2 - SHA224;3 - SHA256;4 - SHA384;5 - SHA512.Property behavior:- supported if version is set to "SNMPv3" and securitylevel is set to "authNoPriv" or "authPriv"

privprotocol.description: SNMPv3 privacy protocol. Used only by SNMPv3 interfaces.Possible values:0 - (default) - DES;1 - AES128;2 - AES192;3 - AES256;4 - AES192C;5 - AES256C.Property behavior:- supported if version is set to "SNMPv3" and securitylevel is set to "authPriv"

contextname.description: SNMPv3 context name.Property behavior:- supported if version is set to "SNMPv3"

hk_events_mode.description: Enable internal housekeeping for events and alerts.Possible values:0 - Disable;1 - (default) Enable.

hk_events_trigger.description: Trigger data storage period. Accepts seconds and time unit with suffix.Default: 365d.

hk_events_service.description: Service data storage period. Accepts seconds and time unit with suffix.Default: 1d.

hk_events_internal.description: Internal data storage period. Accepts seconds and time unit with suffix.Default: 1d.

hk_events_discovery.description: Network discovery data storage period. Accepts seconds and time unit with suffix.Default: 1d.

hk_events_autoreg.description: Autoregistration data storage period. Accepts seconds and time unit with suffix.Default: 1d.

hk_services_mode.description: Enable internal housekeeping for services.Possible values:0 - Disable;1 - (default) Enable.

hk_services.description: Services data storage period. Accepts seconds and time unit with suffix.Default: 365d.

hk_audit_mode.description: Enable internal housekeeping for audit.Possible values:0 - Disable;1 - (default) Enable.

hk_audit.description: Audit data storage period. Accepts seconds and time unit with suffix.Default: 365d.

hk_sessions_mode.description: Enable internal housekeeping for sessions.Possible values:0 - Disable;1 - (default) Enable.

hk_sessions.description: Sessions data storage period. Accepts seconds and time unit with suffix.Default: 365d.

hk_history_mode.description: Enable internal housekeeping for history.Possible values:0 - Disable;1 - (default) Enable.

hk_history_global.description: Override item history period.Possible values:0 - Do not override;1 - (default) Override.

hk_history.description: History data storage period. Accepts seconds and time unit with suffix.Default: 90d.

hk_trends_mode.description: Enable internal housekeeping for trends.Possible values:0 - Disable;1 - (default) Enable.

hk_trends_global.description: Override item trend period.Possible values:0 - Do not override;1 - (default) Override.

hk_trends.description: Trends data storage period. Accepts seconds and time unit with suffix.Default: 365d.

db_extension.description: Configuration flag DB extension. If this flag is set to "timescaledb" then the server changes its behavior for housekeeping and item deletion.Property behavior:- read-only

compression_availability.description: Whether data compression is supported by the database (or its extension).Possible values:0 - Unavailable;1 - Available.Property behavior:- read-only

compression_status.description: Enable TimescaleDB compression for history and trends.Possible values:0 - (default) Off;1 - On.

compress_older.description: Compress history and trends records older than specified period. Accepts seconds and time unit with suffix.Default: 7d.

iconmapid.description: ID of the icon map.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

default_iconid.description: ID of the default icon.Property behavior:- required for create operations

name.description: Name of the icon map.Property behavior:- required for create operations

iconid.description: ID of the icon used by the icon mapping.Property behavior:- required

expression.description: Expression to match the inventory field against.Property behavior:- required

inventory_link.description: ID of the host inventory field.Refer to the host inventory object for a list of supported inventory fields.Property behavior:- required

sortorder.description: Position of the icon mapping in the icon map.Property behavior:- read-only

imageid.description: ID of the image.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

name.description: Name of the image.Property behavior:- required for create operations

imagetype.description: Type of image.Possible values:1 - (default) icon;2 - background image.Property behavior:- constant- required for create operations

image.description: Base64 encoded image.The maximum size of the encoded image is 1 MB. Maximum size can be adjusted by changing ZBX_MAX_IMAGE_SIZE constant value.Supported image formats: PNG, JPEG, GIF.Property behavior:- required for create operations

itemid.description: ID of the item.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

delay.description: Update interval of the item.Accepts seconds or a time unit with suffix (30s,1m,2h,1d).Optionally one or more custom intervals can be specified either as flexible intervals or scheduling.Multiple intervals are separated by a semicolon.User macros may be used. A single macro has to fill the whole field. Multiple macros in a field or macros mixed with text are not supported.Flexible intervals may be written as two macros separated by a forward slash (e.g. {$FLEX_INTERVAL}/{$FLEX_PERIOD}).Property behavior:- required if type is set to "Zabbix agent" (0), "Simple check" (3), "Zabbix internal" (5), "External check" (10), "Database monitor" (11), "IPMI agent" (12), "SSH agent" (13), "TELNET agent" (14), "Calculated" (15), "JMX agent" (16), "HTTP agent" (19), "SNMP agent" (20), "Script" (21), or if type is set to "Zabbix agent (active)" (7) and key_ does not contain "mqtt.get"

hostid.description: ID of the host or template that the item belongs to.Property behavior:- constant- required for create operations

interfaceid.description: ID of the item's host interface.Property behavior:- required if item belongs to host and type is set to "Zabbix agent", "IPMI agent", "JMX agent", "SNMP trap", or "SNMP agent"- supported if item belongs to host and type is set to "Simple check", "External check", "SSH agent", "TELNET agent", or "HTTP agent"- read-only for discovered objects

key_.description: Item key.Property behavior:- required for create operations- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

name.description: Name of the item.Property behavior:- required for create operations- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

type.description: The preprocessing option type.Possible values:1 - Custom multiplier;2 - Right trim;3 - Left trim;4 - Trim;5 - Regular expression matching;6 - Boolean to decimal;7 - Octal to decimal;8 - Hexadecimal to decimal;9 - Simple change;10 - Change per second;11 - XML XPath;12 - JSONPath;13 - In range;14 - Matches regular expression;15 - Does not match regular expression;16 - Check for error in JSON;17 - Check for error in XML;18 - Check for error using regular expression;19 - Discard unchanged;20 - Discard unchanged with heartbeat;21 - JavaScript;22 - Prometheus pattern;23 - Prometheus to JSON;24 - CSV to JSON;25 - Replace;26 - Check unsupported;27 - XML to JSON;28 - SNMP walk value;29 - SNMP walk to JSON.Property behavior:- required

url.description: URL string.Supports user macros, {HOST.IP}, {HOST.CONN}, {HOST.DNS}, {HOST.HOST}, {HOST.NAME}, {ITEM.ID}, {ITEM.KEY}.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

value_type.description: Type of information of the item.Possible values:0 - numeric float;1 - character;2 - log;3 - numeric unsigned;4 - text.Property behavior:- required for create operations- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

allow_traps.description: Allow to populate value similarly to the trapper item.0 - (default) Do not allow to accept incoming data;1 - Allow to accept incoming data.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for discovered objects

authtype.description: Authentication method.Possible values if type is set to "SSH agent":0 - (default) password;1 - public key.Possible values if type is set to "HTTP agent":0 - (default) none;1 - basic;2 - NTLM;3 - Kerberos.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "SSH agent" or "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects (if type is set to "HTTP agent") or discovered objects

description.description: Description of the item.Property behavior:- read-only for discovered objects

error.description: Error text if there are problems updating the item.Property behavior:- read-only

flags.description: Origin of the item.Possible values:0 - a plain item;4 - a discovered item.Property behavior:- read-only

follow_redirects.description: Follow response redirects while pooling data.Possible values:0 - Do not follow redirects;1 - (default) Follow redirects.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

headers.description: Object with HTTP(S) request headers, where header name is used as key and header value as value.Example: { "User-Agent": "Zabbix" }Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

history.description: A time unit of how long the history data should be stored.Also accepts user macro.Default: 90d.Property behavior:- read-only for discovered objects

http_proxy.description: HTTP(S) proxy connection string.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

inventory_link.description: ID of the host inventory field that is populated by the item.Refer to the host inventory page for a list of supported host inventory fields and their IDs.Default: 0.Property behavior:- supported if value_type is set to "numeric float", "character", "numeric unsigned", or "text"- read-only for discovered objects

ipmi_sensor.description: IPMI sensor.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "IPMI agent" and key_ is not set to "ipmi.get"- supported if type is set to "IPMI agent"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

jmx_endpoint.description: JMX agent custom connection string.Default value: service:jmx:rmi:///jndi/rmi://{HOST.CONN}:{HOST.PORT}/jmxrmiProperty behavior:- supported if type is set to "JMX agent"- read-only for discovered objects

lastclock.description: Time when the item was last updated.By default, only values that fall within the last 24 hours are displayed. You can extend this time period by changing the value of Max history display period parameter in the Administration → General menu section.Property behavior:- read-only

lastns.description: Nanoseconds when the item was last updated.By default, only values that fall within the last 24 hours are displayed. You can extend this time period by changing the value of Max history display period parameter in the Administration → General menu section.Property behavior:- read-only

lastvalue.description: Last value of the item.By default, only values that fall within the last 24 hours are displayed. You can extend this time period by changing the value of Max history display period parameter in the Administration → General menu section.Property behavior:- read-only

logtimefmt.description: Format of the time in log entries.Property behavior:- supported if value_type is set to "log"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

master_itemid.description: Master item ID.Recursion up to 3 dependent items and maximum count of dependent items equal to 29999 are allowed.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "Dependent item"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

output_format.description: Should the response be converted to JSON.0 - (default) Store raw;1 - Convert to JSON.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

params.description: Additional parameters used by preprocessing option.Multiple parameters are separated by the newline ( ) character.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "Custom multiplier" (1), "Right trim" (2), "Left trim" (3), "Trim" (4), "Regular expression matching" (5), "XML XPath" (11), "JSONPath" (12), "In range" (13), "Matches regular expression" (14), "Does not match regular expression" (15), "Check for error in JSON" (16), "Check for error in XML" (17), "Check for error using regular expression" (18), "Discard unchanged with heartbeat" (20), "JavaScript" (21), "Prometheus pattern" (22), "Prometheus to JSON" (23), "CSV to JSON" (24), "Replace" (25), "SNMP walk value" (28), or "SNMP walk to JSON" (29)

parameters.description: Additional parameters if type is set to "Script". Array of objects with name and value properties, where name must be unique.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "Script"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

password.description: Password for authentication.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "JMX agent" and username is set- supported if type is set to "Simple check", "SSH agent", "TELNET agent", "Database monitor", or "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects (if type is set to "HTTP agent") or discovered objects

post_type.description: Type of post data body stored in posts property.Possible values:0 - (default) Raw data;2 - JSON data;3 - XML data.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

posts.description: HTTP(S) request body data.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "HTTP agent" and post_type is set to "JSON data" or "XML data"- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent" and post_type is set to "Raw data"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

prevvalue.description: Previous value of the item.By default, only values that fall within the last 24 hours are displayed. You can extend this time period by changing the value of Max history display period parameter in the Administration → General menu section.Property behavior:- read-only

privatekey.description: Name of the private key file.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "SSH agent" and authtype is set to "public key"- read-only for discovered objects

publickey.description: Name of the public key file.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "SSH agent" and authtype is set to "public key"- read-only for discovered objects

query_fields.description: Query parameters. Array of objects with key:value pairs, where value can be an empty string.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

request_method.description: Type of request method.Possible values:0 - (default) GET;1 - POST;2 - PUT;3 - HEAD.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

retrieve_mode.description: What part of response should be stored.Possible values if request_method is set to "GET", "POST", or "PUT":0 - (default) Body;1 - Headers;2 - Both body and headers will be stored.Possible values if request_method is set to "HEAD":1 - Headers.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

snmp_oid.description: SNMP OID.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "SNMP agent"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

ssl_cert_file.description: Public SSL Key file path.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

ssl_key_file.description: Private SSL Key file path.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

ssl_key_password.description: Password for SSL Key file.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

state.description: State of the item.Possible values:0 - (default) normal;1 - not supported.Property behavior:- read-only

status.description: Status of the item.Possible values:0 - (default) enabled item;1 - disabled item.

status_codes.description: Ranges of required HTTP status codes, separated by commas.Also supports user macros as part of comma separated list.Example: 200,200-{$M},{$M},200-400Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

templateid.description: ID of the parent template item.Hint: Use the hostid property to specify the template that the item belongs to.Property behavior:- read-only

timeout.description: Item data polling request timeout.Supports user macros.Default: 3s.Maximum value: 60s.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent" or "Script"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

trapper_hosts.description: Allowed hosts.Property behavior:- readonly for discovered objects- supported if type is set to "Zabbix trapper", or if type is set to "HTTP agent" and allow_traps is set to "Allow to accept incoming data"

trends.description: A time unit of how long the trends data should be stored.Also accepts user macro.Default: 365d.Property behavior:- supported if value_type is set to "numeric float" or "numeric unsigned"- read-only for discovered objects

units.description: Value units.Property behavior:- supported if value_type is set to "numeric float" or "numeric unsigned"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

username.description: Username for authentication.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "SSH agent", "TELNET agent", or if type is set to "JMX agent" and password is set- supported if type is set to "Simple check", "Database monitor", or "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects (if type is set to "HTTP agent") or discovered objects

uuid.description: Universal unique identifier, used for linking imported item to already existing ones. Auto-generated, if not given.Property behavior:- supported if the item belongs to a template

valuemapid.description: ID of the associated value map.Property behavior:- supported if value_type is set to "numeric float", "character", or "numeric unsigned"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

verify_host.description: Validate host name in URL is in Common Name field or a Subject Alternate Name field of host certificate.Possible values:0 - (default) Do not validate;1 - Validate.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

verify_peer.description: Validate is host certificate authentic.Possible values:0 - (default) Do not validate;1 - Validate.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects or discovered objects

error_handler.description: Action type used in case of preprocessing step failure.Possible values:0 - Error message is set by Zabbix server;1 - Discard value;2 - Set custom value;3 - Set custom error message.Possible values if type is set to "Check unsupported":1 - Discard value;2 - Set custom value;3 - Set custom error message.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "Custom multiplier" (1), "Regular expression matching" (5), "Boolean to decimal" (6), "Octal to decimal" (7), "Hexadecimal to decimal" (8), "Simple change" (9), "Change per second" (10), "XML XPath" (11), "JSONPath" (12), "In range" (13), "Matches regular expression" (14), "Does not match regular expression" (15), "Check for error in JSON" (16), "Check for error in XML" (17), "Check for error using regular expression" (18), "Prometheus pattern" (22), "Prometheus to JSON" (23), "CSV to JSON" (24), "Check unsupported" (26), "XML to JSON" (27), "SNMP walk value" (28), or "SNMP walk to JSON" (29)

error_handler_params.description: Error handler parameters.Property behavior:- required if error_handler is set to "Set custom value" or "Set custom error message"

itemid.description: ID of the item prototype.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

delay.description: Update interval of the item prototype.Accepts seconds or a time unit with suffix (30s,1m,2h,1d).Optionally one or more custom intervals can be specified either as flexible intervals or scheduling.Multiple intervals are separated by a semicolon.User macros and LLD macros may be used. A single macro has to fill the whole field. Multiple macros in a field or macros mixed with text are not supported.Flexible intervals may be written as two macros separated by a forward slash (e.g. {$FLEX_INTERVAL}/{$FLEX_PERIOD}).Property behavior:- required if type is set to "Zabbix agent" (0), "Simple check" (3), "Zabbix internal" (5), "External check" (10), "Database monitor" (11), "IPMI agent" (12), "SSH agent" (13), "TELNET agent" (14), "Calculated" (15), "JMX agent" (16), "HTTP agent" (19), "SNMP agent" (20), "Script" (21), or if type is set to "Zabbix agent (active)" (7) and key_ does not contain "mqtt.get"

hostid.description: ID of the host that the item prototype belongs to.Property behavior:- constant- required for create operations

interfaceid.description: ID of the item prototype's host interface.Property behavior:- required if item prototype belongs to host and type is set to "Zabbix agent", "IPMI agent", "JMX agent", "SNMP trap", or "SNMP agent"- supported if item prototype belongs to host and type is set to "Simple check", "External check", "SSH agent", "TELNET agent", or "HTTP agent"

key_.description: Item prototype key.Property behavior:- required for create operations- read-only for inherited objects

name.description: Name of the item prototype.Property behavior:- required for create operations- read-only for inherited objects

type.description: The preprocessing option type.Possible values:1 - Custom multiplier;2 - Right trim;3 - Left trim;4 - Trim;5 - Regular expression matching;6 - Boolean to decimal;7 - Octal to decimal;8 - Hexadecimal to decimal;9 - Simple change;10 - Change per second;11 - XML XPath;12 - JSONPath;13 - In range;14 - Matches regular expression;15 - Does not match regular expression;16 - Check for error in JSON;17 - Check for error in XML;18 - Check for error using regular expression;19 - Discard unchanged;20 - Discard unchanged with heartbeat;21 - JavaScript;22 - Prometheus pattern;23 - Prometheus to JSON;24 - CSV to JSON;25 - Replace;26 - Check unsupported;27 - XML to JSON;28 - SNMP walk value;29 - SNMP walk to JSON.Property behavior:- required

url.description: URL string.Supports LLD macros, user macros, {HOST.IP}, {HOST.CONN}, {HOST.DNS}, {HOST.HOST}, {HOST.NAME}, {ITEM.ID}, {ITEM.KEY}.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

value_type.description: Type of information of the item prototype.Possible values:0 - numeric float;1 - character;2 - log;3 - numeric unsigned;4 - text.Property behavior:- required for create operations- read-only for inherited objects

allow_traps.description: Allow to populate value similarly to the trapper item.0 - (default) Do not allow to accept incoming data;1 - Allow to accept incoming data.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"

authtype.description: Authentication method.Possible values if type is set to "SSH agent":0 - (default) password;1 - public key.Possible values if type is set to "HTTP agent":0 - (default) none;1 - basic;2 - NTLM;3 - Kerberos.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "SSH agent" or "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects (if type is set to "HTTP agent")

follow_redirects.description: Follow response redirects while pooling data.Possible values:0 - Do not follow redirects;1 - (default) Follow redirects.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

headers.description: Object with HTTP(S) request headers, where header name is used as key and header value as value.Example: { "User-Agent": "Zabbix" }Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

history.description: A time unit of how long the history data should be stored.Also accepts user macro and LLD macro.Default: 90d.

http_proxy.description: HTTP(S) proxy connection string.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

ipmi_sensor.description: IPMI sensor.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "IPMI agent" and key_ is not set to "ipmi.get"- supported if type is set to "IPMI agent"- read-only for inherited objects

jmx_endpoint.description: JMX agent custom connection string.Default: service:jmx:rmi:///jndi/rmi://{HOST.CONN}:{HOST.PORT}/jmxrmiProperty behavior:- supported if type is set to "JMX agent"

logtimefmt.description: Format of the time in log entries.Property behavior:- supported if value_type is set to "log"- read-only for inherited objects

master_itemid.description: Master item ID.Recursion up to 3 dependent items and item prototypes and maximum count of dependent items and item prototypes equal to 29999 are allowed.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "Dependent item"- read-only for inherited objects

output_format.description: Should the response be converted to JSON.Possible values:0 - (default) Store raw;1 - Convert to JSON.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

params.description: Additional parameters used by preprocessing option.Multiple parameters are separated by the newline ( ) character.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "Custom multiplier" (1), "Right trim" (2), "Left trim" (3), "Trim" (4), "Regular expression matching" (5), "XML XPath" (11), "JSONPath" (12), "In range" (13), "Matches regular expression" (14), "Does not match regular expression" (15), "Check for error in JSON" (16), "Check for error in XML" (17), "Check for error using regular expression" (18), "Discard unchanged with heartbeat" (20), "JavaScript" (21), "Prometheus pattern" (22), "Prometheus to JSON" (23), "CSV to JSON" (24), "Replace" (25), "SNMP walk value" (28), or "SNMP walk to JSON" (29)

parameters.description: Additional parameters if type is set to "Script". Array of objects with name and value properties, where name must be unique.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "Script"- read-only for inherited objects

password.description: Password for authentication.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "JMX agent" and username is set- supported if type is set to "Simple check", "SSH agent", "TELNET agent", "Database monitor", or "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects (if type is set to "HTTP agent")

post_type.description: Type of post data body stored in posts property.Possible values:0 - (default) Raw data.2 - JSON data.3 - XML data.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

posts.description: HTTP(S) request body data.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "HTTP agent" and post_type is set to "JSON data" or "XML data"- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent" and post_type is set to "Raw data"- read-only for inherited objects

privatekey.description: Name of the private key file.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "SSH agent" and authtype is set to "public key"

publickey.description: Name of the public key file.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "SSH agent" and authtype is set to "public key"

query_fields.description: Query parameters. Array of objects with key:value pairs, where value can be empty string.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

request_method.description: Type of request method.Possible values:0 - (default) GET;1 - POST;2 - PUT;3 - HEAD.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

retrieve_mode.description: What part of response should be stored.Possible values if request_method is set to "GET", "POST", or "PUT":0 - (default) Body;1 - Headers;2 - Both body and headers will be stored.Possible values if request_method is set to "HEAD":1 - Headers.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

snmp_oid.description: SNMP OID.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "SNMP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

ssl_cert_file.description: Public SSL Key file path.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

ssl_key_file.description: Private SSL Key file path.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

ssl_key_password.description: Password for SSL Key file.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

status.description: Status of the item prototype.Possible values:0 - (default) enabled item prototype;1 - disabled item prototype;3 - unsupported item prototype.
