status_codes.description: Ranges of required HTTP status codes, separated by commas.Also supports user macros or LLD macros as part of comma separated list.Example: 200,200-{$M},{$M},200-400Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

templateid.description: ID of the parent template item prototype.Property behavior:- read-only

timeout.description: Item data polling request timeout.Supports user macros and LLD macros.Default: 3s.Maximum value: 60s.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent" or "Script"- read-only for inherited objects

trapper_hosts.description: Allowed hosts.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "Zabbix trapper", or if type is set to "HTTP agent" and allow_traps is set to "Allow to accept incoming data"

trends.description: A time unit of how long the trends data should be stored.Also accepts user macro and LLD macro.Default: 365d.Property behavior:- supported if value_type is set to "numeric float" or "numeric unsigned"

units.description: Value units.Property behavior:- supported if value_type is set to "numeric float" or "numeric unsigned"- read-only for inherited objects

username.description: Username for authentication.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "SSH agent" or "TELNET agent", or if type is set to "JMX agent" and password is set- supported if type is set to "Simple check", "Database monitor", or "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects (if type is set to "HTTP agent")

uuid.description: Universal unique identifier, used for linking imported item prototypes to already existing ones. Auto-generated, if not given.Property behavior:- supported if the item prototype belongs to a template

valuemapid.description: ID of the associated value map.Property behavior:- supported if value_type is set to "numeric float", "character", or "numeric unsigned"- read-only for inherited objects

verify_host.description: Validate host name in URL is in Common Name field or a Subject Alternate Name field of host certificate.Possible values:0 - (default) Do not validate;1 - Validate.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

verify_peer.description: Validate is host certificate authentic.Possible values:0 - (default) Do not validate;1 - Validate.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "HTTP agent"- read-only for inherited objects

discover.description: Item prototype discovery status.Possible values:0 - (default) new items will be discovered;1 - new items will not be discovered and existing items will be marked as lost.

tag.description: Item prototype tag name.Property behavior:- required

error_handler.description: Action type used in case of preprocessing step failure.Possible values:0 - Error message is set by Zabbix server;1 - Discard value;2 - Set custom value;3 - Set custom error message.Possible values if type is set to "Check unsupported":1 - Discard value;2 - Set custom value;3 - Set custom error message.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "Custom multiplier" (1), "Regular expression matching" (5), "Boolean to decimal" (6), "Octal to decimal" (7), "Hexadecimal to decimal" (8), "Simple change" (9), "Change per second" (10), "XML XPath" (11), "JSONPath" (12), "In range" (13), "Matches regular expression" (14), "Does not match regular expression" (15), "Check for error in JSON" (16), "Check for error in XML" (17), "Check for error using regular expression" (18), "Prometheus pattern" (22), "Prometheus to JSON" (23), "CSV to JSON" (24), "Check unsupported" (26), "XML to JSON" (27), "SNMP walk value" (28), or "SNMP walk to JSON" (29)

error_handler_params.description: Error handler parameters.Property behavior:- required if error_handler is set to "Set custom value" or "Set custom error message"

maintenanceid.description: ID of the maintenance.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

name.description: Name of the maintenance.Property behavior:- required for create operations

active_since.description: Time when the maintenance becomes active.The given value will be rounded down to minutes.Property behavior:- required for create operations

active_till.description: Time when the maintenance stops being active.The given value will be rounded down to minutes.Property behavior:- required for create operations

maintenance_type.description: Type of maintenance.Possible values:0 - (default) with data collection;1 - without data collection.

tags_evaltype.description: Problem tag evaluation method.Possible values:0 - (default) And/Or;2 - Or.

period.description: Duration of the maintenance period in seconds.The given value will be rounded down to minutes.Default: 3600.

timeperiod_type.description: Type of time period.Possible values:0 - (default) one time only;2 - daily;3 - weekly;4 - monthly.

start_date.description: Date when the maintenance period must come into effect.The given value will be rounded down to minutes.Default: current date.Property behavior:- supported if timeperiod_type is set to "one time only"

start_time.description: Time of day when the maintenance starts in seconds.The given value will be rounded down to minutes.Default: 0.Property behavior:- supported if timeperiod_type is set to "daily", "weekly", or "monthly"

every.description: For daily and weekly periods every defines the day or week intervals at which the maintenance must come into effect.Default value if timeperiod_type is set to "daily" or "weekly": 1.For monthly periods when day is set, the every property defines the day of the month when the maintenance must come into effect.Default value if timeperiod_type is set to "monthly" and day is set: 1.For monthly periods when dayofweek is set, the every property defines the week of the month when the maintenance must come into effect.Possible values if timeperiod_type is set to "monthly" and dayofweek is set:1 - (default) first week;2 - second week;3 - third week;4 - fourth week;5 - last week.Property behavior:- supported if timeperiod_type is set to "daily", "weekly", or "monthly"

dayofweek.description: Days of the week when the maintenance must come into effect.Days are stored in binary form with each bit representing the corresponding day. For example, 4 equals 100 in binary and means, that maintenance will be enabled on Wednesday.Property behavior:- required if timeperiod_type is set to "weekly", or if timeperiod_type is set to "monthly" and day is not set- supported if timeperiod_type is set to "monthly"

day.description: Day of the month when the maintenance must come into effect.Property behavior:- required if timeperiod_type is set to "monthly" and dayofweek is not set- supported if timeperiod_type is set to "monthly"

month.description: Months when the maintenance must come into effect.Months are stored in binary form with each bit representing the corresponding month. For example, 5 equals 101 in binary and means, that maintenance will be enabled in January and March.Property behavior:- required if timeperiod_type is set to "monthly"

sysmapid.description: ID of the map that the URL belongs to.

height.description: Height of the shape in pixels.Default: 200.

name.description: Link caption.Property behavior:- required

width.description: Width of the shape in pixels.Default: 200.

backgroundid.description: ID of the image used as the background for the map.

expand_macros.description: Whether to expand macros in labels when configuring the map.Possible values:0 - (default) do not expand macros;1 - expand macros.

expandproblem.description: Whether the problem trigger will be displayed for elements with a single problem.Possible values:0 - always display the number of problems;1 - (default) display the problem trigger if there's only one problem.

grid_align.description: Whether to enable grid aligning.Possible values:0 - disable grid aligning;1 - (default) enable grid aligning.

grid_show.description: Whether to show the grid on the map.Possible values:0 - do not show the grid;1 - (default) show the grid.

grid_size.description: Size of the map grid in pixels.Supported values: 20, 40, 50, 75 and 100.Default: 50.

highlight.description: Whether icon highlighting is enabled.Possible values:0 - highlighting disabled;1 - (default) highlighting enabled.

iconmapid.description: ID of the icon map used on the map.

label_format.description: Whether to enable advanced labels.Possible values:0 - (default) disable advanced labels;1 - enable advanced labels.

label_location.description: Location of the map element label.Possible values:-1 - (default) default location;0 - bottom;1 - left;2 - right;3 - top.

label_string_host.description: Custom label for host elements.Property behavior:- required if label_type_host is set to "custom"

label_string_hostgroup.description: Custom label for host group elements.Property behavior:- required if label_type_hostgroup is set to "custom"

label_string_image.description: Custom label for image elements.Property behavior:- required if label_type_image is set to "custom"

label_string_map.description: Custom label for map elements.Property behavior:- required if label_type_map is set to "custom"

label_string_trigger.description: Custom label for trigger elements.Property behavior:- required if label_type_trigger is set to "custom"

label_type.description: Map element label type.Possible values:0 - label;1 - IP address;2 - (default) element name;3 - status only;4 - nothing.

label_type_host.description: Label type for host elements.Possible values:0 - label;1 - IP address;2 - (default) element name;3 - status only;4 - nothing;5 - custom.

label_type_hostgroup.description: Label type for host group elements.Possible values:0 - label;2 - (default) element name;3 - status only;4 - nothing;5 - custom.

label_type_image.description: Label type for host group elements.Possible values:0 - label;2 - (default) element name;4 - nothing;5 - custom.

label_type_map.description: Label type for map elements.Possible values:0 - label;2 - (default) element name;3 - status only;4 - nothing;5 - custom.

label_type_trigger.description: Label type for trigger elements.Possible values:0 - label;2 - (default) element name;3 - status only;4 - nothing;5 - custom.

markelements.description: Whether to highlight map elements that have recently changed their status.Possible values:0 - (default) do not highlight elements;1 - highlight elements.

severity_min.description: Minimum severity of the triggers that will be displayed on the map.Refer to the trigger severity property for a list of supported trigger severities.

show_unack.description: How problems should be displayed.Possible values:0 - (default) display the count of all problems;1 - display only the count of unacknowledged problems;2 - display the count of acknowledged and unacknowledged problems separately.

private.description: Type of map sharing.Possible values:0 - public map;1 - (default) private map.

show_suppressed.description: Whether suppressed problems are shown.Possible values:0 - (default) hide suppressed problems;1 - show suppressed problems.

selementid.description: ID of the map element that the URL belongs to.

elements.description: Element data object.Property behavior:- required if elementtype is set to "host", "map", "trigger" or "host group"

elementtype.description: Type of map element for which the URL will be available.Refer to the map element type property for a list of supported types.Default: 0.

iconid_off.description: ID of the image used to display the element in default state.Property behavior:- required

areatype.description: How separate host group hosts should be displayed.Possible values:0 - (default) the host group element will take up the whole map;1 - the host group element will have a fixed size.

elementsubtype.description: How a host group element should be displayed on a map.Possible values:0 - (default) display the host group as a single element;1 - display each host in the group separately.

evaltype.description: Map element tag filtering condition evaluation method.Possible values:0 - (default) AND / OR;2 - OR.

iconid_disabled.description: ID of the image used to display disabled map elements.Property behavior:- supported if elementtype is set to "host", "map", "trigger", or "host group"

iconid_maintenance.description: ID of the image used to display map elements in maintenance.Property behavior:- supported if elementtype is set to "host", "map", "trigger", or "host group"

iconid_on.description: ID of the image used to display map elements with problems.Property behavior:- supported if elementtype is set to "host", "map", "trigger", or "host group"

permission.description: Type of permission level.Possible values:2 - read only;3 - read-write.Property behavior:- required

urls.description: Map element URLs.The map element URL object is described in detail below.

use_iconmap.description: Whether icon mapping must be used for host elements.Possible values:0 - do not use icon mapping;1 - (default) use icon mapping.

viewtype.description: Host group element placing algorithm.Possible values:0 - (default) grid.

x.description: X-coordinates of the shape in pixels.Default: 0.

y.description: Y-coordinates of the shape in pixels.Default: 0.

triggerid.description: ID of the trigger used as a link indicator.Property behavior:- required

tag.description: Map element tag name.Property behavior:- required

operator.description: Map element tag condition operator.Possible values:0 - (default) Contains;1 - Equals;2 - Does not contain;3 - Does not equal;4 - Exists;5 - Does not exist.

sysmapelementurlid.description: ID of the map element URL.Property behavior:- read-only

linkid.description: ID of the map link that the link trigger belongs to.

selementid1.description: ID of the first map element linked on one end.Property behavior:- required

selementid2.description: ID of the first map element linked on the other end.Property behavior:- required

color.description: Indicator color as a hexadecimal color code.Default: DD0000.

drawtype.description: Indicator draw style.Possible values:0 - (default) line;2 - bold line;3 - dotted line;4 - dashed line.

linktriggers.description: Map link triggers to use as link status indicators.The map link trigger object is described in detail below.

linktriggerid.description: ID of the map link trigger.Property behavior:- read-only

sysmapurlid.description: ID of the map URL.Property behavior:- read-only

sysmapuserid.description: ID of the map user.Property behavior:- read-only

sysmapusrgrpid.description: ID of the map user group.Property behavior:- read-only

sysmap_shapeid.description: ID of the map shape element.Property behavior:- read-only

type.description: Type of map shape element.Possible values:0 - rectangle;1 - ellipse.Property is required when new shapes are created.Property behavior:- required

font.description: Font of the text within shape.Possible values:0 - Georgia, serif1 - “Palatino Linotype”, “Book Antiqua”, Palatino, serif2 - “Times New Roman”, Times, serif3 - Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif4 - “Arial Black”, Gadget, sans-serif5 - “Comic Sans MS”, cursive, sans-serif6 - Impact, Charcoal, sans-serif7 - “Lucida Sans Unicode”, “Lucida Grande”, sans-serif8 - Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif9 - “Trebuchet MS”, Helvetica, sans-serif10 - Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif11 - “Courier New”, Courier, monospace12 - “Lucida Console”, Monaco, monospaceDefault: 9.

text_halign.description: Horizontal alignment of text.Possible values:0 - center;1 - left;2 - right.Default: 0.

text_valign.description: Vertical alignment of text.Possible values:0 - middle;1 - top;2 - bottom.Default: 0.

border_type.description: Type of the border.Possible values:0 - none;1 - —————;2 - ·····;3 - - - -.Default: 0.

border_width.description: Width of the border in pixels.Default: 0.

zindex.description: Value used to order all shapes and lines (z-index).Default: 0.

x1.description: X-coordinates of the line point 1 in pixels.Default: 0.

y1.description: Y-coordinates of the line point 1 in pixels.Default: 0.

x2.description: X-coordinates of the line point 2 in pixels.Default: 200.

line_type.description: Type of the lines.Possible values:0 - none;1 - —————;2 - ·····;3 - - - -.Default: 0.

mediatypeid.description: ID of the media type.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

name.description: Parameter name.Property behavior:- required

smtp_server.description: SMTP server.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "Email"

smtp_port.description: SMTP server port to connect to.

smtp_security.description: SMTP connection security level to use.Possible values:0 - None;1 - STARTTLS;2 - SSL/TLS.

smtp_verify_host.description: SSL verify host for SMTP.Possible values:0 - No;1 - Yes.

smtp_verify_peer.description: SSL verify peer for SMTP.Possible values:0 - No;1 - Yes.

smtp_authentication.description: SMTP authentication method to use.Possible values:0 - None;1 - Normal password.

status.description: Whether the media type is enabled.Possible values:0 - (default) Enabled;1 - Disabled.

username.description: User name.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "Email"

maxsessions.description: The maximum number of alerts that can be processed in parallel.Possible values if type is set to "SMS": (default) 1.Possible values if type is set to "Email", "Script", or "Webhook": 0-100.

maxattempts.description: The maximum number of attempts to send an alert.Possible values: 1-100.Default value: 3.

attempt_interval.description: The interval between retry attempts. Accepts seconds and time unit with suffix.Possible values: 0-1h.Default value: 10s.

content_type.description: Message format.Possible values:0 - plain text;1 - (default) html.

script.description: Media type webhook script javascript body.

timeout.description: Media type webhook script timeout.Accepts seconds and time unit with suffix.Possible values: 1-60s.Default: 30s.

process_tags.description: Defines should the webhook script response to be interpreted as tags and these tags should be added to associated event.Possible values:0 - (default) Ignore webhook script response;1 - Process webhook script response as tags.

show_event_menu.description: Show media type entry in problem.get and event.get property urls.Possible values:0 - (default) Do not add urls entry;1 - Add media type to urls property.

event_menu_url.description: Define url property of media type entry in urls property of problem.get and event.get.

event_menu_name.description: Define name property of media type entry in urls property of problem.get and event.get.

parameters.description: Array of webhook or script input parameters.

value.description: Parameter value, supports macros.Supported macros are described on the Supported macros page.

sortorder.description: The order in which the parameters will be passed to the script as command-line arguments. Starting with 0 as the first one.

eventsource.description: Event source.Possible values:0 - triggers;1 - discovery;2 - autoregistration;3 - internal;4 - services.Property behavior:- required

recovery.description: Operation mode.Possible values:0 - operations;1 - recovery operations;2 - update operations.Property behavior:- required

source.description: Type of the problem event.Possible values:0 - event created by a trigger;3 - internal event;4 - event created on service status update.

object.description: Type of object that is related to the problem event.Possible values if source is set to "event created by a trigger":0 - trigger.Possible values if source is set to "internal event":0 - trigger;4 - item;5 - LLD rule.Possible values if source is set to "event created on service status update":6 - service.

clock.description: Time when the problem event was created.

ns.description: Nanoseconds when the problem event was created.

r_clock.description: Time when the recovery event was created.

r_ns.description: Nanoseconds when the recovery event was created.

correlationid.description: Correlation rule ID if this event was recovered by global correlation rule.

userid.description: User ID if the problem was manually closed.

name.description: Media type defined URL name.

acknowledged.description: Acknowledge state for problem.Possible values:0 - not acknowledged;1 - acknowledged.

severity.description: Problem current severity.Possible values:0 - not classified;1 - information;2 - warning;3 - average;4 - high;5 - disaster.

suppressed.description: Whether the problem is suppressed.Possible values:0 - problem is in normal state;1 - problem is suppressed.

proxyid.description: ID of the proxy.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

host.description: Name of the proxy.Property behavior:- required for create operations

status.description: Type of proxy.Possible values:5 - active proxy;6 - passive proxy.Property behavior:- required for create operations

lastaccess.description: Time when the proxy last connected to the server.Property behavior:- read-only

tls_connect.description: Connections to host.Possible values:1 - (default) No encryption;2 - PSK;4 - certificate.

tls_accept.description: Connections from host.This is a bitmask field, any combination of possible bitmap values is acceptable.Possible bitmap values:1 - (default) No encryption;2 - PSK;4 - certificate.

tls_psk_identity.description: PSK identity.Do not put sensitive information in the PSK identity, it is transmitted unencrypted over the network to inform a receiver which PSK to use.Property behavior:- write-only- required if tls_connect is set to "PSK", or tls_accept contains the "PSK" bit

tls_psk.description: The preshared key, at least 32 hex digits.Property behavior:- write-only- required if tls_connect is set to "PSK", or tls_accept contains the "PSK" bit

proxy_address.description: Comma-delimited IP addresses or DNS names of active Zabbix proxy.

auto_compress.description: Indicates if communication between Zabbix server and proxy is compressed.Possible values:0 - No compression;1 - Compression enabled.Property behavior:- read-only

version.description: Version of proxy.Three-part Zabbix version number, where two decimal digits are used for each part, e.g., 50401 for version 5.4.1, 60200 for version 6.2.0, etc.0 - Unknown proxy version.Property behavior:- read-only

compatibility.description: Version of proxy compared to Zabbix server version.Possible values:0 - Undefined;1 - Current version (proxy and server have the same major version);2 - Outdated version (proxy version is older than server version, but is partially supported);3 - Unsupported version (proxy version is older than server previous LTS release version or server major version is older than proxy major version).Property behavior:- read-only

dns.description: DNS name to connect to.Can be empty if connections are made via IP address.Property behavior:- required if useip is set to "connect using DNS name"

ip.description: IP address to connect to.Can be empty if connections are made via DNS names.Property behavior:- required if useip is set to "connect using IP address"

port.description: Port number to connect to.Property behavior:- required

useip.description: Whether the connection should be made via IP address.Possible values:0 - connect using DNS name;1 - connect using IP address.Property behavior:- required

reportid.description: ID of the report.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

userid.description: ID of user to send the report to.Property behavior:- required

name.description: Unique name of the report.Property behavior:- required for create operations

dashboardid.description: ID of the dashboard that the report is based on.Property behavior:- required for create operations

period.description: Period for which the report will be prepared.Possible values:0 - (default) previous day;1 - previous week;2 - previous month;3 - previous year.

cycle.description: Period repeating schedule.Possible values:0 - (default) daily;1 - weekly;2 - monthly;3 - yearly.

start_time.description: Time of the day, in seconds, when the report will be prepared for sending.Default: 0.

weekdays.description: Days of the week for sending the report.Days of the week are stored in binary form with each bit representing the corresponding week day. For example, 12 equals 1100 in binary and means that reports will be sent every Wednesday and Thursday.Default: 0.Property behavior:- required if cycle is set to "weekly".

active_since.description: On which date to start.Possible values:empty string - (default) not specified (stored as 0);specific date in YYYY-MM-DD format (stored as a timestamp of the beginning of a day (00:00:00)).

active_till.description: On which date to end.Possible values:empty string - (default) not specified (stored as 0);specific date in YYYY-MM-DD format (stored as a timestamp of the end of a day (23:59:59)).

status.description: Whether the report is enabled or disabled.Possible values:0 - Disabled;1 - (default) Enabled.

state.description: State of the report.Possible values:0 - (default) report was not yet processed;1 - report was generated and successfully sent to all recipients;2 - report generating failed; "info" contains error information;3 - report was generated, but sending to some (or all) recipients failed; "info" contains error information.Property behavior:- read-only

lastsent.description: Unix timestamp of the last successfully sent report.Property behavior:- read-only

info.description: Error description or additional information.Property behavior:- read-only

access_userid.description: ID of user on whose behalf the report will be generated.0 - (default) Generate report by recipient.

exclude.description: Whether to exclude the user from mailing list.Possible values:0 - (default) Include;1 - Exclude.

usrgrpid.description: ID of user group to send the report to.Property behavior:- required

roleid.description: ID of the role.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

name.description: Name of the action.Possible values if type of Role object is set to "User", "Admin", or "Super admin:edit_dashboards - Create and edit dashboards;edit_maps - Create and edit maps;add_problem_comments - Add problem comments;change_severity - Change problem severity;acknowledge_problems - Acknowledge problems;suppress_problems - Suppress problems;close_problems - Close problems;execute_scripts - Execute scripts;manage_api_tokens - Manage API tokens.Possible values if type of Role object is set to "Admin" or "Super admin":edit_maintenance - Create and edit maintenances;manage_scheduled_reports - Manage scheduled reports,manage_sla - Manage SLA.Possible values if type of Role object is set to "User" or "Admin":invoke_execute_now - allows to execute item checks for users that have only read permissions on host.Property behavior:- required

type.description: User type.Possible values:1 - (default) User;2 - Admin;3 - Super admin.Property behavior:- required for create operations

readonly.description: Whether the role is readonly.Possible values:0 - (default) No;1 - Yes.Property behavior:- read-only

ui.description: Array of the UI element objects.

ui.default_access.description: Whether access to new UI elements is enabled.Possible values:0 - Disabled;1 - (default) Enabled.

services.read.mode.description: Read-only access to services.Possible values:0 - Read-only access to the services, specified by the services.read.list or matched by the services.read.tag properties;1 - (default) Read-only access to all services.

services.read.list.description: Array of Service objects.The specified services, including child services, will be granted a read-only access to the user role. Read-only access will not override read-write access to the services.Property behavior:- supported if services.read.mode is set to "0"

services.read.tag.description: Array of Service tag object.The tag matched services, including child services, will be granted a read-only access to the user role. Read-only access will not override read-write access to the services.Property behavior:- supported if services.read.mode is set to "0"

services.write.mode.description: Read-write access to services.Possible values:0 - (default) Read-write access to the services, specified by the services.write.list or matched by the services.write.tag properties;1 - Read-write access to all services.

services.write.list.description: Array of Service objects.The specified services, including child services, will be granted a read-write access to the user role. Read-write access will override read-only access to the services.Property behavior:- supported if services.write.mode is set to "0"

services.write.tag.description: Array of Service tag object.The tag matched services, including child services, will be granted a read-write access to the user role. Read-write access will override read-only access to the services.Property behavior:- supported if services.write.mode is set to "0"

modules.default_access.description: Whether access to new modules is enabled.Possible values:0 - Disabled;1 - (default) Enabled.

api.access.description: Whether access to API is enabled.Possible values:0 - Disabled;1 - (default) Enabled.

api.mode.description: Mode for treating API methods listed in the api property.Possible values:0 - (default) Deny list;1 - Allow list.

actions.default_access.description: Whether access to new actions is enabled.Possible values:0 - Disabled;1 - (default) Enabled.

status.description: Whether access to perform the action is enabled.Possible values:0 - Disabled;1 - (default) Enabled.

serviceid.description: ID of the Service.Property behavior:- required

tag.description: Tag name.If empty string is specified, the service tag will not be used for service matching.Property behavior:- required

value.description: Tag value.If no value or empty string is specified, only the tag name will be used for service matching.

moduleid.description: ID of the module.Property behavior:- required

scriptid.description: ID of the script.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

name.description: Parameter name.Property behavior:- required

type.description: Script type.Possible values if scope is set to "action operation":0 - Script;1 - IPMI;2 - SSH;3 - TELNET;5 - Webhook.Possible values if scope is set to "manual host action" or "manual event action":6 - URL.Property behavior:- required for create operations

command.description: Command to run.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "Script", "IPMI", "SSH", "TELNET", or "Webhook"

scope.description: Script scope.Possible values:1 - action operation;2 - manual host action;4 - manual event action.Property behavior:- required for create operations

execute_on.description: Where to run the script.Possible values:0 - run on Zabbix agent;1 - run on Zabbix server;2 - (default) run on Zabbix server (proxy).Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "Script"

menu_path.description: Folders separated by slash that form a menu like navigation in frontend when clicked on host or event.Property behavior:- supported if scope is set to "manual host action" or "manual event action"

authtype.description: Authentication method used for SSH script type.Possible values:0 - password;1 - public key.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "SSH"

username.description: User name used for authentication.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "SSH" or "TELNET"

password.description: Password used for SSH scripts with password authentication and TELNET scripts.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "SSH" and authtype is set to "password", or type is set to "TELNET"

publickey.description: Name of the public key file used for SSH scripts with public key authentication.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "SSH" and authtype is set to "public key"

privatekey.description: Name of the private key file used for SSH scripts with public key authentication.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "SSH" and authtype is set to "public key"

port.description: Port number used for SSH and TELNET scripts.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "SSH" or "TELNET"

groupid.description: ID of the host group that the script can be run on.If set to "0", the script will be available on all host groups.Default: 0.

usrgrpid.description: ID of the user group that will be allowed to run the script.If set to "0", the script will be available for all user groups.Default: 0.Property behavior:- supported if scope is set to "manual host action" or "manual event action"

host_access.description: Host permissions needed to run the script.Possible values:2 - (default) read;3 - write.Property behavior:- supported if scope is set to "manual host action" or "manual event action"

confirmation.description: Confirmation pop up text.The pop up will appear when trying to run the script from the Zabbix frontend.Property behavior:- supported if scope is set to "manual host action" or "manual event action"

timeout.description: Webhook script execution timeout in seconds. Time suffixes are supported (e.g., 30s, 1m).Possible values: 1-60s.Default: 30s.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "Webhook"

parameters.description: Array of webhook input parameters.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "Webhook"

url.description: User defined URL.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "URL"

new_window.description: Open URL in a new window.Possible values:0 - No;1 - (default) Yes.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "URL"

ms.description: The time elapsed in milliseconds since the script was run before log entry was added.

serviceid.description: ID of the service.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

algorithm.description: Status calculation rule. Only applicable if child services exist.Possible values:0 - set status to OK;1 - most critical if all children have problems;2 - most critical of child services.Property behavior:- required for create operations

name.description: Name of the service.Property behavior:- required for create operations

sortorder.description: Position of the service used for sorting.Possible values: 0-999.Property behavior:- required for create operations

propagation_rule.description: Status propagation rule.Possible values:0 - (default) propagate service status as is - without any changes;1 - increase the propagated status by a given propagation_value (by 1 to 5 severities);2 - decrease the propagated status by a given propagation_value (by 1 to 5 severities);3 - ignore this service - the status is not propagated to the parent service at all;4 - set fixed service status using a given propagation_value.Property behavior:- required if propagation_value is set

propagation_value.description: Status propagation value.Possible values if propagation_rule is set to "0" or "3":0 - Not classified.Possible values if propagation_rule is set to "1" or "2":1 - Information;2 - Warning;3 - Average;4 - High;5 - Disaster.Possible values if propagation_rule is set to "4":-1 - OK;0 - Not classified;1 - Information;2 - Warning;3 - Average;4 - High;5 - Disaster.Property behavior:- required if propagation_rule is set

status.description: Whether the service is in OK or problem state.If the service is in problem state, status is equal either to:- the severity of the most critical problem;- the highest status of a child service in problem state.If the service is in OK state, status is equal to: -1.Property behavior:- read-only

uuid.description: Universal unique identifier, used for linking imported services to already existing ones. Auto-generated, if not given.

created_at.description: Unix timestamp when service was created.

readonly.description: Access to the service.Possible values:0 - Read-write;1 - Read-only.Property behavior:- read-only

type.description: Condition for setting (New status) status.Possible values:0 - if at least (N) child services have (Status) status or above;1 - if at least (N%) of child services have (Status) status or above;2 - if less than (N) child services have (Status) status or below;3 - if less than (N%) of child services have (Status) status or below;4 - if weight of child services with (Status) status or above is at least (W);5 - if weight of child services with (Status) status or above is at least (N%);6 - if weight of child services with (Status) status or below is less than (W);7 - if weight of child services with (Status) status or below is less than (N%).Where:- N (W) is limit_value;- (Status) is limit_status;- (New status) is new_status.Property behavior:- required

limit_value.description: Limit value.Possible values:- for N and W: 1-100000;- for N%: 1-100.Property behavior:- required

limit_status.description: Limit status.Possible values:-1 - OK;0 - Not classified;1 - Information;2 - Warning;3 - Average;4 - High;5 - Disaster.Property behavior:- required

new_status.description: New status value.Possible values:0 - Not classified;1 - Information;2 - Warning;3 - Average;4 - High;5 - Disaster.Property behavior:- required

clock.description: Time when the service state change has happened.

operator.description: Mapping condition operator.Possible values:0 - (default) equals;2 - like.

default_timezone.description: System time zone by default.Default: system - system default.For the full list of supported time zones please refer to PHP documentation.

default_theme.description: Default theme.Possible values:blue-theme - (default) Blue;dark-theme - Dark;hc-light - High-contrast light;hc-dark - High-contrast dark.

search_limit.description: Limit for search and filter results.Default: 1000.

max_overview_table_size.description: Max number of columns and rows in Data overview and Trigger overview dashboard widgets.Default: 50.

max_in_table.description: Max count of elements to show inside table cell.Default: 50.

server_check_interval.description: Show warning if Zabbix server is down.Possible values:0 - Do not show warning;10 - (default) Show warning.

show_technical_errors.description: Show technical errors (PHP/SQL) to non-Super admin users and to users that are not part of user groups with debug mode enabled.Possible values:0 - (default) Do not technical errors;1 - Show technical errors.

history_period.description: Max period to display history data in Latest data, Web, and Data overview dashboard widgets.Accepts seconds and time unit with suffix.Default: 24h.

period_default.description: Time filter default period.Accepts seconds and time unit with suffix with month and year support (30s, 1m, 2h, 1d, 1M, 1y).Default: 1h.

max_period.description: Max period for time filter.Accepts seconds and time unit with suffix with month and year support (30s, 1m, 2h, 1d, 1M, 1y).Default: 2y.

severity_color_0.description: Color for "Not classified" severity as a hexadecimal color code.Default: 97AAB3.

severity_color_1.description: Color for "Information" severity as a hexadecimal color code.Default: 7499FF.

severity_color_2.description: Color for "Warning" severity as a hexadecimal color code.Default: FFC859.

severity_color_3.description: Color for "Average" severity as a hexadecimal color code.Default: FFA059.

severity_color_4.description: Color for "High" severity as a hexadecimal color code.Default: E97659.

severity_color_5.description: Color for "Disaster" severity as a hexadecimal color code.Default: E45959.

severity_name_0.description: Name for "Not classified" severity.Default: Not classified.

custom_color.description: Use custom event status colors.Possible values:0 - (default) Do not use custom event status colors;1 - Use custom event status colors.

ok_period.description: Display OK triggers period.Accepts seconds and time unit with suffix.Default: 5m.

blink_period.description: On status change triggers blink period.Accepts seconds and time unit with suffix.Default: 2m.

problem_unack_color.description: Color for unacknowledged PROBLEM events as a hexadecimal color code.Default: CC0000.

problem_ack_color.description: Color for acknowledged PROBLEM events as a hexadecimal color code.Default: CC0000.

ok_unack_color.description: Color for unacknowledged RESOLVED events as a hexadecimal color code.Default: 009900.

ok_ack_color.description: Color for acknowledged RESOLVED events as a hexadecimal color code.Default: 009900.

problem_unack_style.description: Blinking for unacknowledged PROBLEM events.Possible values:0 - Do not show blinking;1 - (default) Show blinking.

problem_ack_style.description: Blinking for acknowledged PROBLEM events.Possible values:0 - Do not show blinking;1 - (default) Show blinking.

ok_unack_style.description: Blinking for unacknowledged RESOLVED events.Possible values:0 - Do not show blinking;1 - (default) Show blinking.

ok_ack_style.description: Blinking for acknowledged RESOLVED events.Possible values:0 - Do not show blinking;1 - (default) Show blinking.

discovery_groupid.description: ID of the host group to which will be automatically placed discovered hosts.

default_inventory_mode.description: Default host inventory mode.Possible values:-1 - (default) Disabled;0 - Manual;1 - Automatic.

alert_usrgrpid.description: ID of the user group to which will be sending database down alarm message.If set to "0", the alarm message will not be sent.

snmptrap_logging.description: Log unmatched SNMP traps.Possible values:0 - Do not log unmatched SNMP traps;1 - (default) Log unmatched SNMP traps.

login_attempts.description: Number of failed login attempts after which login form will be blocked.Default: 5.

login_block.description: Time interval during which login form will be blocked if number of failed login attempts exceeds defined in login_attempts field.Accepts seconds and time unit with suffix.Default: 30s.

validate_uri_schemes.description: Validate URI schemes.Possible values:0 - Do not validate;1 - (default) Validate.

iframe_sandboxing_enabled.description: Use iframe sandboxing.Possible values:0 - Do not use;1 - (default) Use.

media_type_test_timeout.description: Network timeout for media type test.Default: 65s.

report_test_timeout.description: Network timeout for scheduled report test.Default: 60s.

auditlog_enabled.description: Enable audit logging.Possible values:0 - Disable;1 - (default) Enable.

geomaps_tile_provider.description: Geomap tile provider.Possible values:OpenStreetMap.Mapnik - (default) OpenStreetMap Mapnik;OpenTopoMap - OpenTopoMap;Stamen.TonerLite - Stamen Toner Lite;Stamen.Terrain - Stamen Terrain;USGS.USTopo - USGS US Topo;USGS.USImagery - USGS US Imagery.Supports empty string to specify custom values of geomaps_tile_url, geomaps_max_zoom and geomaps_attribution.

geomaps_tile_url.description: Geomap tile URL.Property behavior:- supported if geomaps_tile_provider is set to empty string

geomaps_max_zoom.description: Geomap max zoom level.Possible values: 0-30.Property behavior:- supported if geomaps_tile_provider is set to empty string

geomaps_attribution.description: Geomap attribution text.Property behavior:- supported if geomaps_tile_provider is set to empty string

vault_provider.description: Vault provider.Possible values:0 - (default) HashiCorp Vault;1 - CyberArk Vault.

slaid.description: ID of the SLA.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

name.description: Name of the excluded downtime.Property behavior:- required

period.description: Reporting period of the SLA.Possible values:0 - daily;1 - weekly;2 - monthly;3 - quarterly;4 - annually.Property behavior:- required for create operations

slo.description: Minimum acceptable Service Level Objective expressed as a percent. If the Service Level Indicator (SLI) drops lower, the SLA is considered to be in problem/unfulfilled state.Possible values: 0-100 (up to 4 fractional digits).Property behavior:- required for create operations

effective_date.description: Effective date of the SLA.Possible values: date timestamp in UTC.

timezone.description: Reporting time zone, for example: Europe/London, UTC.For the full list of supported time zones please refer to PHP documentation.Property behavior:- required for create operations

status.description: Status of the SLA.Possible values:0 - (default) disabled SLA;1 - enabled SLA.

period_from.description: Starting time of the excluded downtime (inclusive).Possible values: timestamp.Property behavior:- required

period_to.description: Ending time of the excluded downtime (exclusive).Possible values: timestamp.Property behavior:- required

tag.description: SLA service tag name.Property behavior:- required

operator.description: SLA service tag operator.Possible values:0 - (default) equals;2 - like

taskid.description: ID of the task.Property behavior:- read-only

type.description: Type of the task.Possible values:1 - Diagnostic information;2 - Refresh proxy configuration;6 - Execute now.Property behavior:- required

status.description: Status of the task result.Possible values:-1 - error occurred during performing task;0 - task result is created.Property behavior:- read-only

clock.description: Time when the task was created.Property behavior:- read-only

ttl.description: The time in seconds after which task expires.Property behavior:- read-only

proxy_hostid.description: ID of the proxy about which diagnostic information statistic is collected.Property behavior:- supported if type is set to "Diagnostic information" or "Refresh proxy configuration"

request.description: Task request object according to the task type:Object of 'Execute now' task is described in detail below;Object of 'Refresh proxy configuration' task is described in detail below;Object of 'Diagnostic information' task is described in detail below.Property behavior:- required

result.description: Result object of the diagnostic information task.May contain NULL if result is not yet ready.Result object is described in detail below.Property behavior:- read-only

itemid.description: ID of item and low-level discovery rules.

historycache.description: History cache statistic request. Available on server and proxy.

valuecache.description: Items cache statistic request. Available on server.

preprocessing.description: Preprocessing manager statistic request. Available on server and proxy.

alerting.description: Alert manager statistic request. Available on server.

stats.description: Statistic object properties to be returned.The list of available fields for each type of diagnostic information statistic are described in detail below.Default: extend will return all available statistic fields.

top.description: Object to sort and limit returned statistic values.The list of available fields for each type of diagnostic information statistic are described in detail below.Example: { “source.alerts”: 10 }

data.description: Results according the statistic request object of particular diagnostic information task.Contains error message string if error occurred during performing task.

templateid.description: ID of the template.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

host.description: Technical name of the template.Property behavior:- required for create operations

name.description: Visible name of the template.Default: host property value.

uuid.description: Universal unique identifier, used for linking imported templates to already existing ones. Auto-generated, if not given.

vendor_name.description: Template vendor name.For create operations, both vendor_name and vendor_version should be either set or left empty. For update operations, vendor_version can be left empty if it has a value in the database.

vendor_version.description: Template vendor version.For create operations, both vendor_name and vendor_version should be either set or left empty. For update operations, vendor_name can be left empty if it has a value in the database.

dashboardid.description: ID of the template dashboard.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

name.description: Widget field name.Property behavior:- required

templateid.description: ID of the template the dashboard belongs to.Property behavior:- constant- required for create operations

display_period.description: Dashboard page display period (in seconds).Possible values: 0, 10, 30, 60, 120, 600, 1800, 3600.Default: 0 (will use the default page display period).

auto_start.description: Auto start slideshow.Possible values:0 - do not auto start slideshow;1 - (default) auto start slideshow.

uuid.description: Universal unique identifier, used for linking imported template dashboards to already existing ones. Auto-generated, if not given.

dashboard_pageid.description: ID of the dashboard page.Property behavior:- read-only

widgets.description: Array of the template dashboard widget objects.

widgetid.description: ID of the dashboard widget.Property behavior:- read-only

type.description: Type of the widget field.Possible values:0 - Integer;1 - String;4 - Item;5 - Item prototype;6 - Graph;7 - Graph prototype.Property behavior:- required

x.description: A horizontal position from the left side of the dashboard.Valid values range from 0 to 23.

y.description: A vertical position from the top of the dashboard.Valid values range from 0 to 62.

width.description: The widget width.Valid values range from 1 to 24.

height.description: The widget height.Valid values range from 2 to 32.

view_mode.description: The widget view mode.Possible values:0 - (default) default widget view;1 - with hidden header;

fields.description: Array of the template dashboard widget field objects.

value.description: Widget field value depending on type.Property behavior:- required

tokenid.description: ID of the token.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

name.description: Name of the token.Property behavior:- required for create operations

userid.description: A user the token has been assigned to.Default: current user.Property behavior:- constant

lastaccess.description: Most recent date and time the token was authenticated."0" if the token has never been authenticated.Property behavior:- read-only

status.description: Token status.Possible values:0 - (default) enabled token;1 - disabled token.

expires_at.description: Token expiration date and time."0" for never-expiring tokens.

created_at.description: Token creation date and time.Property behavior:- read-only

creator_userid.description: The creator user of the token.Property behavior:- read-only

clock.description: Timestamp of an hour for which the value was calculated. For example, timestamp of "04:00:00" means values calculated for period "04:00:00-04:59:59".

num.description: Number of values that were available for the hour.

triggerid.description: ID of the trigger.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

description.description: Name of the trigger.Property behavior:- required for create operations

expression.description: Reduced trigger expression.Property behavior:- required for create operations

event_name.description: Event name generated by the trigger.

error.description: Error text if there have been any problems when updating the state of the trigger.Property behavior:- read-only

flags.description: Origin of the trigger.Possible values:0 - (default) a plain trigger;4 - a discovered trigger.Property behavior:- read-only

lastchange.description: Time when the trigger last changed its state.Property behavior:- read-only

priority.description: Severity of the trigger.Possible values:0 - (default) not classified;1 - information;2 - warning;3 - average;4 - high;5 - disaster.

state.description: State of the trigger.Possible values:0 - (default) trigger state is up to date;1 - current trigger state is unknown.Property behavior:- read-only

status.description: Whether the trigger is enabled or disabled.Possible values:0 - (default) enabled;1 - disabled.

templateid.description: ID of the parent template trigger.Property behavior:- read-only

type.description: Whether the trigger can generate multiple problem events.Possible values:0 - (default) do not generate multiple events;1 - generate multiple events.

url_name.description: Label for the URL associated with the trigger.

recovery_mode.description: OK event generation mode.Possible values:0 - (default) Expression;1 - Recovery expression;2 - None.

correlation_mode.description: OK event closes.Possible values:0 - (default) All problems;1 - All problems if tag values match.

manual_close.description: Allow manual close.Possible values:0 - (default) No;1 - Yes.

uuid.description: Universal unique identifier, used for linking imported triggers to already existing ones. Auto-generated, if not given.Property behavior:- supported if the trigger belongs to a template

triggerid.description: ID of the trigger prototype.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

description.description: Name of the trigger prototype.Property behavior:- required for create operations

expression.description: Reduced trigger expression.Property behavior:- required for create operations

event_name.description: Event name generated by the trigger.

comments.description: Additional comments to the trigger prototype.

priority.description: Severity of the trigger prototype.Possible values:0 - (default) not classified;1 - information;2 - warning;3 - average;4 - high;5 - disaster.

status.description: Whether the trigger prototype is enabled or disabled.Possible values:0 - (default) enabled;1 - disabled.

templateid.description: ID of the parent template trigger prototype.Property behavior:- read-only

type.description: Whether the trigger prototype can generate multiple problem events.Possible values:0 - (default) do not generate multiple events;1 - generate multiple events.

url.description: URL associated with the trigger prototype.

url_name.description: Label for the URL associated with the trigger prototype.

recovery_mode.description: OK event generation mode.Possible values:0 - (default) Expression;1 - Recovery expression;2 - None.

correlation_mode.description: OK event closes.Possible values:0 - (default) All problems;1 - All problems if tag values match.

manual_close.description: Allow manual close.Possible values:0 - (default) No;1 - Yes.

discover.description: Trigger prototype discovery status.Possible values:0 - (default) new triggers will be discovered;1 - new triggers will not be discovered and existing triggers will be marked as lost.

uuid.description: Universal unique identifier, used for linking imported trigger prototypes to already existing ones. Auto-generated, if not given.Property behavior:- supported if the trigger prototype belongs to a template

tag.description: Trigger prototype tag name.Property behavior:- required

userid.description: ID of the user.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

username.description: User's name.Property behavior:- required for create operations- read-only for provisioned users if the user is linked to a user directory (userdirectoryid is set to a valid value that is not "0"), and user directory provisioning status is enabled (provision_status of User directory object is set to "1"), and authentication status of all LDAP or SAML provisioning is enabled (ldap_jit_status of Authentication object is set to "Enabled for configured LDAP IdPs" or saml_jit_status of Authentication object is set to "Enabled for configured SAML IdPs")

passwd.description: User's password.The value of this parameter can be an empty string if the user is linked to a user directory.Property behavior:- write-only

attempt_clock.description: Time of the last unsuccessful login attempt.Property behavior:- read-only

attempt_failed.description: Recent failed login attempt count.Property behavior:- read-only

attempt_ip.description: IP address from where the last unsuccessful login attempt came from.Property behavior:- read-only

autologin.description: Whether to enable auto-login.Possible values:0 - (default) auto-login disabled;1 - auto-login enabled.

autologout.description: User session life time. Accepts seconds and time unit with suffix. If set to 0s, the session will never expire.Default: 15m.

lang.description: Language code of the user's language, for example, en_GB.Default: default - system default.

name.description: Name of the user.

refresh.description: Automatic refresh period. Accepts seconds and time unit with suffix.Default: 30s.

rows_per_page.description: Amount of object rows to show per page.Default: 50.

theme.description: User's theme.Possible values:default - (default) system default;blue-theme - Blue;dark-theme - Dark.

ts_provisioned.description: Time when the latest provisioning operation was made.Property behavior:- read-only

url.description: URL of the page to redirect the user to after logging in.

userdirectoryid.description: ID of the user directory that the user in linked to.Used for provisioning (creating or updating), as well as to login a user that is linked to a user directory.For login operations the value of this property will have priority over the userdirectoryid property of user groups that the user belongs to.Default: 0.

timezone.description: User's time zone, for example, Europe/London, UTC.Default: default - system default.For the full list of supported time zones please refer to PHP documentation.

mediatypeid.description: ID of the media type used by the media.Property behavior:- required

sendto.description: Address, user name or other identifier of the recipient.If type of Media type is set to "Email", values are represented as array. For other types of Media types, value is represented as a string.Property behavior:- required

active.description: Whether the media is enabled.Possible values:0 - (default) enabled;1 - disabled.

severity.description: Trigger severities to send notifications about.Severities are stored in binary form with each bit representing the corresponding severity. For example, "12" equals "1100" in binary and means that notifications will be sent from triggers with severities "warning" and "average".Refer to the trigger object page for a list of supported trigger severities.Default: 63.

period.description: Time when the notifications can be sent as a time period or user macros separated by a semicolon.Default: 1-7,00:00-24:00.

usrgrpid.description: ID of the user group.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

name.description: Name of the user group.Property behavior:- required for create operations

debug_mode.description: Whether debug mode is enabled or disabled.Possible values:0 - (default) disabled;1 - enabled.

gui_access.description: Frontend authentication method of the users in the group.Possible values:0 - (default) use the system default authentication method;1 - use internal authentication;2 - use LDAP authentication;3 - disable access to the frontend.

users_status.description: Whether the user group is enabled or disabled.For deprovisioned users, the user group cannot be enabled.Possible values:0 - (default) enabled;1 - disabled.

userdirectoryid.description: User directory used for authentication.Property behavior:- supported if gui_access is set to "use the system default authentication method" or "use LDAP authentication"

id.description: ID of the host group or template group to add permission to.Property behavior:- required

permission.description: Access level to the host group or template group.Possible values:0 - access denied;2 - read-only access;3 - read-write access.Property behavior:- required for create operations

groupid.description: ID of the host group to add permission to.Property behavior:- required

globalmacroid.description: ID of the global macro.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

macro.description: Macro string.Property behavior:- required for create operations

value.description: Value of the macro.Property behavior:- write-only if type is set to "Secret macro"- required for create operations

type.description: Type of macro.Possible values:0 - (default) Text macro;1 - Secret macro;2 - Vault secret.

hostmacroid.description: ID of the host macro.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

hostid.description: ID of the host that the macro belongs to.Property behavior:- constant- required for create operations

automatic.description: Defines whether the macro is controlled by discovery rule.Possible values:0 - (default) Macro is managed by user;1 - Macro is managed by discovery rule.User is not allowed to create automatic macro.To update automatic macro, it must be converted to manual.

valuemapid.description: ID of the value map.Property behavior:- read-only- required for update operations

hostid.description: ID of the host or template that the value map belongs to.Property behavior:- constant- required for create operations

name.description: Name of the value map.Property behavior:- required for create operations

mappings.description: Value mappings for current value map. The mapping object is described in detail below.Property behavior:- required for create operations

uuid.description: Universal unique identifier, used for linking imported value maps to already existing ones. Auto-generated, if not given.Property behavior:- supported if the value map belongs to a template

type.description: Mapping match type.Possible values:0 - (default) mapping will be applied if value is equal;1 - mapping will be applied if value is greater or equal1;2 - mapping will be applied if value is less or equal1;3 - mapping will be applied if value is in range (ranges are inclusive; multiple ranges, separated by comma character, can be defined)1;4 - mapping will be applied if value matches a regular expression2;5 - if no matches are found, mapping will not be applied, and the default value will be used.If type is set to "0", "1", "2", "3", "4", then value cannot be empty.If type is set to "5", then value must be empty.

value.description: Original value.Property behavior:- required if type is set to "1", "2", "3", "4"- supported if type is set to "5"

newvalue.description: Value to which the original value is mapped to.Property behavior:- required
